Dialogue: But I believe it good to be interested in species other than our own.

Original: Fran:If you manage to catch me unawares, I may just overlook it.
Dialogue: If you manage to catch me unawares, I may just overlook it.

Original: Lion:Good luck with that one, Cater...
Dialogue: Good luck with that one, Cater...

Original: Fran:There are...so many of you.
Dialogue: There are...so many of you.

Original: Vaan:Of course. It's been just you and Balthier for a long time! But it must be heartening to have so many allies now, right?
Dialogue: Of course. It's been just you and Balthier for a long time! But it must be heartening to have so many allies now, right?

Original: Bartz:Though some of us are just here in their own interest.
Dialogue: Though some of us are just here in their own interest.

Original: Penelo:Yeah... And some are pretty scary, too.
Dialogue: Yeah... And some are pretty scary, too.

Original: Locke:And there are a few who you really don't want watching your back.
Dialogue: And there are a few who you really don't want watching your back.

Original: Fran:But are there not also those whom you can trust?
Dialogue: But are there not also those whom you can trust?

Original: Bartz:You're right. I never thought I'd see the day I'd fight beside Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: You're right. I never thought I'd see the day I'd fight beside Gilgamesh.

Original: Quistis:When moving together with this great of number, it's both unusual and...unifying.
Dialogue: When moving together with this great of number, it's both unusual and...unifying.

Original: Penelo:And you want to protect all your allies, not just the ones from your own world.
Dialogue: And you want to protect all your allies, not just the ones from your own world.

Original: Vaan:I know I can rely on each and every one of them.
Dialogue: I know I can rely on each and every one of them.

Original: Fran:...You are more grown-up than the Vaan I know.
Dialogue: ...You are more grown-up than the Vaan I know.

Original: Locke:Oh really? He still seems like a kid to me.
Dialogue: Oh really? He still seems like a kid to me.

Original: Quistis:It wouldn't hurt you to calm down a bit, though I wouldn't take it as far as Squall has... And a little tact would do you some good.
Dialogue: It wouldn't hurt you to calm down a bit, though I wouldn't take it as far as Squall has... And a little tact would do you some good.

Original: Fran:You may be right.
Dialogue: You may be right.

Original: Vaan:Well that's not very fair. Everyone's a child to you, Fran!
Dialogue: Well that's not very fair. Everyone's a child to you, Fran!

Original: Vaan:Even Bartz and Locke and the others...
Dialogue: Even Bartz and Locke and the others...

Original: Bartz:I've got a bad feeling about this... You better quit while you're ahead, Vaan.
Dialogue: I've got a bad feeling about this... You better quit while you're ahead, Vaan.

Original: Locke:Why? What's up?
Dialogue: Why? What's up?

Original: Vaan:Other worlds I don't know, but in Ivalice, some people live a looong time. I can't say exactly how old Fran is, but yeah...
Dialogue: Other worlds I don't know, but in Ivalice, some people live a looong time. I can't say exactly how old Fran is, but yeah...

Original: Locke:Oh really? Hearing about tribes from other worlds is pretty fascinating.
Dialogue: Oh really? Hearing about tribes from other worlds is pretty fascinating.

Original: Penelo:V-Vaan, hold it!
Dialogue: V-Vaan, hold it!

Original: Penelo:Think about what Quistis said! You need to be more tactful!
Dialogue: Think about what Quistis said! You need to be more tactful!

Original: Quistis:Yes, Vaan... This is exactly what I was talking about.
Dialogue: Yes, Vaan... This is exactly what I was talking about.

Original: Fran:Hehe... You really have not changed at all.
Dialogue: Hehe... You really have not changed at all.

Original: Bartz:We had better call it quits here. There are just some things you don't talk about.
Dialogue: We had better call it quits here. There are just some things you don't talk about.

Original: ???:What should I do...
Dialogue: What should I do...

Original: ???:Excuse me... I'm looking for somebody. Would you mind...stepping aside?
Dialogue: Excuse me... I'm looking for somebody. Would you mind...stepping aside?

Original: ???:...Alright. If you won't move, then...
Dialogue: ...Alright. If you won't move, then...

Original: ???:I'll just have to take you down!
Dialogue: I'll just have to take you down!

Original: Zack:Whew! Wasn't that last battle a blast?
Dialogue: Whew! Wasn't that last battle a blast?

Original: Zack:Did you see my special technique? It slayed that monster!
Dialogue: Did you see my special technique? It slayed that monster!

Original: Seifer:What are you getting all excited about?
Dialogue: What are you getting all excited about?

Original: Seifer:I was the one who landed the finishing blow.
Dialogue: I was the one who landed the finishing blow.

Original: Zack:Wh-what'd you say!?
Dialogue: Wh-what'd you say!?

Original: Zack:Alright, buddy! Let's settle this right here and right now!
Dialogue: Alright, buddy! Let's settle this right here and right now!

Original: Seifer:If it'll shut you up, it'd be my pleasure.
Dialogue: If it'll shut you up, it'd be my pleasure.

Original: Zack:Likewise! You'll be sorry for picking a fight with me, you
Dialogue: Likewise! You'll be sorry for picking a fight with me, you—

Original: Onion Knight:Settle down, you two. What's the point in fighting about it?
Dialogue: Settle down, you two. What's the point in fighting about it?

Original: Zack:He's trying to steal my thunder!
Dialogue: He's trying to steal my thunder!

Original: Krile:Hehe... Even though you say that, I can tell you care about Seifer.
Dialogue: Hehe... Even though you say that, I can tell you care about Seifer.

Original: Krile:You don't want him to feel alone, right?
Dialogue: You don't want him to feel alone, right?

Original: Zack:H-huh!? How did you know that? What gave it away...?
Dialogue: H-huh!? How did you know that? What gave it away...?

Original: Seifer:Hey... Thanks to your big mouth, we've got guests now.
Dialogue: Hey... Thanks to your big mouth, we've got guests now.

Original: Zack:I-is that my fault...?
Dialogue: I-is that my fault...?

Original: Krile:Everyone, look! Over there! A little girl is surrounded by monsters!
Dialogue: Everyone, look! Over there! A little girl is surrounded by monsters!

Original: Onion Knight:We've gotta save her!
Dialogue: We've gotta save her!

Original: Krile:She seems pretty calm, though...
Dialogue: She seems pretty calm, though...

Original: Zack:She's probably so scared she can't move! Let's go!
Dialogue: She's probably so scared she can't move! Let's go!

Original: Seifer:Where are you running off to!? Those monsters are mine!
Dialogue: Where are you running off to!? Those monsters are mine!

Original: Krile:Hehe. Sometimes I can't tell if they're friends or not...
Dialogue: Hehe. Sometimes I can't tell if they're friends or not...

Original: Onion Knight:C'mon, there's no time to waste, Krile!
Dialogue: C'mon, there's no time to waste, Krile!

Original: ???:Hyah! Take that!
Dialogue: Hyah! Take that!

Original: ???:...That should do it.
Dialogue: ...That should do it.

Original: Zack:Huh!? Did you defeat them all by yourself!?
Dialogue: Huh!? Did you defeat them all by yourself!?

Original: ???:Oh? Did you come to help? Thank you!
Dialogue: Oh? Did you come to help? Thank you!

Original: Zack:Oh, uh, you're welcome...
Dialogue: Oh, uh, you're welcome...

Original: Seifer:Are you stupid or something?
Dialogue: Are you stupid or something?

Original: Porom:Palom!?
Dialogue: Palom!?

Original: Porom:I finally found you! Where have you been?
Dialogue: I finally found you! Where have you been?

Original: Palom:I should ask the same to you! But I'm happy you're fine.
Dialogue: I should ask the same to you! But I'm happy you're fine.

Original: Cecil:Porom! I'm so glad to see you unharmed.
Dialogue: Porom! I'm so glad to see you unharmed.

Original: Porom:Likewise, Cecil. It's a relief to see you.
Dialogue: Likewise, Cecil. It's a relief to see you.

Original: Zack:Is this little girl...
Dialogue: Is this little girl...

Original: Aerith:Palom's twin sister?
Dialogue: Palom's twin sister?

Original: Palom:That's right! Her name's Porom, and she's super strongjust like me!
Dialogue: That's right! Her name's Porom, and she's super strong—just like me!

Original: Seifer:Hmph... That's better than useless.
Dialogue: Hmph... That's better than useless.

Original: Aerith:Palom called you a prodigy, and he certainly wasn't exaggerating.
Dialogue: Palom called you a prodigy, and he certainly wasn't exaggerating.

Original: Porom:I'm no prodigy... We're still in training, after all.
Dialogue: I'm no prodigy... We're still in training, after all.

Original: Porom:...My apologies for being so forward, but who might you be...?
Dialogue: ...My apologies for being so forward, but who might you be...?

Original: Porom:...I see. And that's why I'm now in a different world...
Dialogue: ...I see. And that's why I'm now in a different world...

Original: Porom:I'm sure it hasn't been easy taking care of my brother. Please accept my heartfelt thanks.
Dialogue: I'm sure it hasn't been easy taking care of my brother. Please accept my heartfelt thanks.

Original: Zack:...I noticed it before, but you're so polite.
Dialogue: ...I noticed it before, but you're so polite.

Original: Seifer:Unlike your brother.
Dialogue: Unlike your brother.

Original: Palom:Wh-what's that supposed to mean!?
Dialogue: Wh-what's that supposed to mean!?

Original: Porom:Enough, Palom! Mind your manners!
Dialogue: Enough, Palom! Mind your manners!

Original: Palom:Urk, now I'm in for it...
Dialogue: Urk, now I'm in for it...

Original: Porom:I'm sure my brother's caused you all sorts of trouble, playing pranks and the like...
Dialogue: I'm sure my brother's caused you all sorts of trouble, playing pranks and the like...

Original: Palom:Hey! Why isn't anyone defending me!?
Dialogue: Hey! Why isn't anyone defending me!?

Original: Porom:...You warriors from other worlds can take it easy now. Rest assured I'll take care of Palom.
Dialogue: ...You warriors from other worlds can take it easy now. Rest assured I'll take care of Palom.

Original: Porom:From now on, I'll be happy to travel with you while keeping an eye on him!
Dialogue: From now on, I'll be happy to travel with you while keeping an eye on him!

Original: Palom:What!? I don't need a babysitter!
Dialogue: What!? I don't need a babysitter!

Original: Porom:Quiet, Palom!
Dialogue: Quiet, Palom!

Original: Cecil:Thank you, Porom. Your presence is a great relief to us...
Dialogue: Thank you, Porom. Your presence is a great relief to us...

Original: Aerith:We're happy to welcome such a reliable new friend on board!
Dialogue: We're happy to welcome such a reliable new friend on board!

Original: Porom:Hehe. Leave everything to me!
Dialogue: Hehe. Leave everything to me!

Original: Mog:Go here, kupo... And then there, kupo...
Dialogue: Go here, kupo... And then there, kupo...

Original: Mog:I'm so busy, kupo... Being a spirit guide sure isn't easy...
Dialogue: I'm so busy, kupo... Being a spirit guide sure isn't easy...

Original: Mog:Wh-who's there, kupo?
Dialogue: Wh-who's there, kupo?

Original: Mog:HELP ME, KUPOOO!
Dialogue: HELP ME, KUPOOO!

Original: Yang:That's Lord Mog's voice!
Dialogue: That's Lord Mog's voice!

Original: Maria:Oh no! Mog is being attacked by monsters!
Dialogue: Oh no! Mog is being attacked by monsters!

Original: Auron:There's no time to waste. Let's go!
Dialogue: There's no time to waste. Let's go!

Original: Mog:P-please don't eat me! I'm bad for your tummy, kupo!
Dialogue: P-please don't eat me! I'm bad for your tummy, kupo!

Original: Yang:He's too far away! We might not make it!
Dialogue: He's too far away! We might not make it!

Original: Maria:No...! Mog!
Dialogue: No...! Mog!

Original: Palom:Heeey! Over here!
Dialogue: Heeey! Over here!

Original: Palom:This way, big guy!
Dialogue: This way, big guy!

Original: Porom:We'll play with you!
Dialogue: We'll play with you!

Original: Palom:Now, Auron!
Dialogue: Now, Auron!

Original: Porom:Save Mog!
Dialogue: Save Mog!

Original: Auron:Hmph. Those kids...
Dialogue: Hmph. Those kids...

Original: Yang:Understood. Leave the rest to us!
Dialogue: Understood. Leave the rest to us!

Original: Mog:That was a close one, kupo...
Dialogue: That was a close one, kupo...

Original: Porom:Are you alright, Mog?
Dialogue: Are you alright, Mog?

Original: Mog:I'm just fine, thanks to you two, kupo!
Dialogue: I'm just fine, thanks to you two, kupo!

Original: Palom:Hehe! Just think where you'd be without us!
Dialogue: Hehe! Just think where you'd be without us!

Original: Porom:Quit boasting, will you?
Dialogue: Quit boasting, will you?

Original: Maria:But you two did admirably. If you hadn't been there, we might not have reached Mog in time.
Dialogue: But you two did admirably. If you hadn't been there, we might not have reached Mog in time.

Original: Auron:Indeed. Risking your own life to protect a comrade is no easy feat.
Dialogue: Indeed. Risking your own life to protect a comrade is no easy feat.

Original: Yang:These two risked their very lives to save us from being crushed by the walls.
Dialogue: These two risked their very lives to save us from being crushed by the walls.

Original: Porom:That's right...
Dialogue: That's right...

Original: Palom:Well, we couldn't let you guys die like that!
Dialogue: Well, we couldn't let you guys die like that!

Original: Maria:How incredible. You two are so courageous.
Dialogue: How incredible. You two are so courageous.

Original: Auron:The future looks bright for these two...
Dialogue: The future looks bright for these two...

Original: Porom:Thank you! We'll continue to do our best to help this world.
Dialogue: Thank you! We'll continue to do our best to help this world.

Original: Palom:Yeah! We're prodigies, after all!
Dialogue: Yeah! We're prodigies, after all!

Original: Porom:Palom! What did I say about boasting!?
Dialogue: Palom! What did I say about boasting!?

Original: Porom:I'm so glad Angelo's with us! She's such a big help!
Dialogue: I'm so glad Angelo's with us! She's such a big help!

Original: Cinque:Yeah! She can sniff out dangerous areas. What a nifty trick!
Dialogue: Yeah! She can sniff out dangerous areas. What a nifty trick!

Original: Rinoa:Did you hear that, Angelo? Everyone loves you!
Dialogue: Did you hear that, Angelo? Everyone loves you!

Original: Laguna:Now wait just a minute!
Dialogue: Now wait just a minute!

Original: Laguna:My instincts say we should go thataway!
Dialogue: My instincts say we should go thataway!

Original: Cecil:Ah, Laguna's sixth sense at it again...
Dialogue: Ah, Laguna's sixth sense at it again...

Original: Cinque:Again? But aren't you wrong, like, every time?
Dialogue: Again? But aren't you wrong, like, every time?

Original: Laguna:No, no! This time I'm sure of it!
Dialogue: No, no! This time I'm sure of it!

Original: Laguna:But Angelo's nose is nothing to sneeze at! So why don't we have a vote?
Dialogue: But Angelo's nose is nothing to sneeze at! So why don't we have a vote?

Original: Rinoa:I can already see how this will end...
Dialogue: I can already see how this will end...

Original: Porom:Well, I'm with Angelo!
Dialogue: Well, I'm with Angelo!

Original: Porom:After all, I can smell monsters from over there!
Dialogue: After all, I can smell monsters from over there!

Original: Cinque:Oho, I see, I see!
Dialogue: Oho, I see, I see!

Original: Rinoa:And where there are monsters, there's a Torsion!
Dialogue: And where there are monsters, there's a Torsion!

Original: Rinoa:...Wait a second. Did you say you can smell monsters?
Dialogue: ...Wait a second. Did you say you can smell monsters?

Original: Porom:Yes. Let's call it...mage's intuition.
Dialogue: Yes. Let's call it...mage's intuition.

Original: Laguna:Whoa! Seriously!? That's amazing, Porom!
Dialogue: Whoa! Seriously!? That's amazing, Porom!

Original: Cinque:If even Cecilski says so, then it must be true!
Dialogue: If even Cecilski says so, then it must be true!

Original: Laguna:Alright! Then I'm with Angelo and Porom on this one!
Dialogue: Alright! Then I'm with Angelo and Porom on this one!

Original: Laguna:Now that you mention it...it really does smell like monsters.
Dialogue: Now that you mention it...it really does smell like monsters.

Original: Rinoa:Really? What does it smell like?
Dialogue: Really? What does it smell like?

Original: Laguna:Hmm... It's sour...or maybe bittersweet...?
Dialogue: Hmm... It's sour...or maybe bittersweet...?

Original: Cinque:Is that true, Poromie?
Dialogue: Is that true, Poromie?

Original: Porom:Not even close.
Dialogue: Not even close.

Original: Porom:If I let him out of my sight for even a second, he's off pulling pranks. He doesn't have any tact, either...
Dialogue: If I let him out of my sight for even a second, he's off pulling pranks. He doesn't have any tact, either...

Original: Chelinka:If Yuri finds something interesting, he rushes off without thinking...
Dialogue: If Yuri finds something interesting, he rushes off without thinking...

Original: Reynn:My brother hasn't got a care in the world and can't sit still, and he's an idiot on top...
Dialogue: My brother hasn't got a care in the world and can't sit still, and he's an idiot on top...

Original: Porom:Sigh... I guess everyone's got it pretty rough...
Dialogue: Sigh... I guess everyone's got it pretty rough...

Original: Chelinka:We've got to do our best as big sisters!
Dialogue: We've got to do our best as big sisters!

Original: Porom:You're right. I guess it's because we're all in the same boat, but I feel closer to both of you than most.
Dialogue: You're right. I guess it's because we're all in the same boat, but I feel closer to both of you than most.

Original: Reynn:Hehe... It must be some sort of destiny to bring us together!
Dialogue: Hehe... It must be some sort of destiny to bring us together!

Original: Reynn:I say we start the Big Sister Alliance here and now!
Dialogue: I say we start the Big Sister Alliance here and now!

Original: Palom:Grr! All my sister's done since she got here is scold me! I've had enough!
Dialogue: Grr! All my sister's done since she got here is scold me! I've had enough!

Original: Yuri:I guess we make them worry a lot, but I wish they would trust us more...
Dialogue: I guess we make them worry a lot, but I wish they would trust us more...

Original: Lann:Yeah! I won't let her be the boss of me forever!
Dialogue: Yeah! I won't let her be the boss of me forever!

Original: Palom:Hmm... I guess we've all got it pretty rough...
Dialogue: Hmm... I guess we've all got it pretty rough...

Original: Palom:We can't let this go on! Today's the day!
Dialogue: We can't let this go on! Today's the day!

Original: Yuri:We'll tell them straight!
Dialogue: We'll tell them straight!

Original: Lann:The Little Brother Alliance strikes back!
Dialogue: The Little Brother Alliance strikes back!

Original: Palom:Hey! We've got something to say to you!
Dialogue: Hey! We've got something to say to you!

Original: Palom:So listen up! We always
Dialogue: So listen up! We always—

Original: Porom:Palom! You drew on monsters again, didn't you!?
Dialogue: Palom! You drew on monsters again, didn't you!?

Original: Chelinka:Yuri, too... What's going to happen if you keep doing dangerous things like that?
Dialogue: Yuri, too... What's going to happen if you keep doing dangerous things like that?

Original: Yuri:But we're fine... No, um, sorry.
Dialogue: But we're fine... No, um, sorry.

Original: Reynn:Did you give Mog the message I told you earlier, Lann?
Dialogue: Did you give Mog the message I told you earlier, Lann?

Original: Lann:Whoops! I totally forgot!
Dialogue: Whoops! I totally forgot!

Original: Porom:Good grief. How many times do I have to tell you?
Dialogue: Good grief. How many times do I have to tell you?

Original: Porom:Go and take care of those monsters right now! They're rampaging all over the place!
Dialogue: Go and take care of those monsters right now! They're rampaging all over the place!

Original: Chelinka:And you're going to help, Yuri.
Dialogue: And you're going to help, Yuri.

Original: Reynn:Lann, go and tell Mog. On the double!
Dialogue: Lann, go and tell Mog. On the double!

Original: Chelinka:Phew... It just never ends...
Dialogue: Phew... It just never ends...

Original: Reynn:Didn't they say they wanted to tell us something? I wonder what it was.
Dialogue: Didn't they say they wanted to tell us something? I wonder what it was.

Original: Porom:...Knowing them, nothing important.
Dialogue: ...Knowing them, nothing important.

Original: ???:Hellooo? Come in,Class Zero! Anyone?
Dialogue: Hellooo? Come in, Class Zero! Anyone?

Original: ???:That's weird... My COMM isn't working. Maybe something's interfering with the signal...
Dialogue: That's weird... My COMM isn't working. Maybe something's interfering with the signal...

Original: ???:Where did everyone go? If I can still remember them, that means they're at least alive.
Dialogue: Where did everyone go? If I can still remember them, that means they're at least alive.

Original: ???:Magitek armor? But I don't recognize this type. Must be new!
Dialogue: Magitek armor? But I don't recognize this type. Must be new!

Original: ???:...But I don't have time to play with you now. I've got to find the others first!
Dialogue: ...But I don't have time to play with you now. I've got to find the others first!

Original: ???:Helloooooo! Ace? King!?
Dialogue: Helloooooo! Ace? King!?

Original: ???:Someone? Anyone? Answer me!
Dialogue: Someone? Anyone? Answer me!

Original: ???:Ohhh, how annoying! Stop interfering with my signal!
Dialogue: Ohhh, how annoying! Stop interfering with my signal!

Original: ???:Now I'm angry! I'll beat you black and blue!
Dialogue: Now I'm angry! I'll beat you black and blue!

Original: Steiner:...A COMM? What's that?
Dialogue: ...A COMM? What's that?

Original: King:A "Crystal Oriented Messaging Medium."
Dialogue: A "Crystal Oriented Messaging Medium."

Original: Cater:It's a communication device... But I guess that doesn't help much. It's basically a magical item.
Dialogue: It's a communication device... But I guess that doesn't help much. It's basically a magical item.

Original: Cater:You can use the COMM to talk to your comrades, even if they're far away.
Dialogue: You can use the COMM to talk to your comrades, even if they're far away.

Original: Maria:How convenient!
Dialogue: How convenient!

Original: Steiner:Being able to talk to distant comrades... What a mysterious device.
Dialogue: Being able to talk to distant comrades... What a mysterious device.

Original: King:Unfortunately, we can't use it here.
Dialogue: Unfortunately, we can't use it here.

Original: Maria:That's a pity...
Dialogue: That's a pity...

Original: ???:Ahaha! Wait, waaait! We're having so much fun!
Dialogue: Ahaha! Wait, waaait! We're having so much fun!

Original: Steiner:Wh-what was that? Is someone fighting around here!?
Dialogue: Wh-what was that? Is someone fighting around here!?

Original: Maria:That girl over there! Let's go!
Dialogue: That girl over there! Let's go!

Original: Cater:That laugh... It's got to be her.
Dialogue: That laugh... It's got to be her.

Original: ???:Upsy-daisy! Now crumble!
Dialogue: Upsy-daisy! Now crumble!

Original: Cait Sith:Look, over there! Someone's destroying the magitek armor!
Dialogue: Look, over there! Someone's destroying the magitek armor!

Original: Freya:Someone from another world... From the looks of her uniform, she must be one of Ace's schoolmates.
Dialogue: Someone from another world... From the looks of her uniform, she must be one of Ace's schoolmates.

Original: Cait Sith:How impressive. She's swinging that heavy weapon around like it's nothing.
Dialogue: How impressive. She's swinging that heavy weapon around like it's nothing.

Original: Ashe:Just what kind of magic is she wielding...?
Dialogue: Just what kind of magic is she wielding...?

Original: ???:...Hmm? Well, lookie here! People in weird clothing spotted!
Dialogue: ...Hmm? Well, lookie here! People in weird clothing spotted!

Original: ???:Are you their reinforcements? You must be!
Dialogue: Are you their reinforcements? You must be!

Original: Ashe:H-hold it! Don't jump to conclusions!
Dialogue: H-hold it! Don't jump to conclusions!

Original: Cait Sith:We're not your enemies! We just wanna talk.
Dialogue: We're not your enemies! We just wanna talk.

Original: Cinque:Ace! Seven!
Dialogue: Ace! Seven!

Original: Cinque:I'm so happy to see you! How've you been?
Dialogue: I'm so happy to see you! How've you been?

Original: Freya:She's not bothered at all...
Dialogue: She's not bothered at all...

Original: Seven:...And that's the current situation. Did you get that, Cinque?
Dialogue: ...And that's the current situation. Did you get that, Cinque?

Original: Cinque:Oh, sorry about earlier! I made a big mistake.
Dialogue: Oh, sorry about earlier! I made a big mistake.

Original: Ashe:You decided we were enemies, even though we'd just met...
Dialogue: You decided we were enemies, even though we'd just met...

Original: Cinque:I said I'm sorry. It wasn't on purpose.
Dialogue: I said I'm sorry. It wasn't on purpose.

Original: Ashe:Could you say it like you mean it...?
Dialogue: Could you say it like you mean it...?

Original: Freya:She does not seem to feel any remorse, either...
Dialogue: She does not seem to feel any remorse, either...

Original: Ace:Sorry, you two. Cinque is just this kind of person.
Dialogue: Sorry, you two. Cinque is just this kind of person.

Original: Cait Sith:It's water under the bridge now.
Dialogue: It's water under the bridge now.

Original: Cait Sith:Shouldn't you take it easy, Ashe?
Dialogue: Shouldn't you take it easy, Ashe?

Original: Ashe:...You're right. People like her won't listen no matter what you say anyway.
Dialogue: ...You're right. People like her won't listen no matter what you say anyway.

Original: Freya:However...even after finding out she was in a different world, she did not show the slightest hint of surprise.
Dialogue: However...even after finding out she was in a different world, she did not show the slightest hint of surprise.

Original: Cinque:Hmm? I may not look it, but I swear I'm super shocked!
Dialogue: Hmm? I may not look it, but I swear I'm super shocked!

Original: Cinque:But I guess I'm just a lot happier to see my classmates!
Dialogue: But I guess I'm just a lot happier to see my classmates!

Original: Cait Sith:A beautiful friendship, indeed! I'm almost jealous.
Dialogue: A beautiful friendship, indeed! I'm almost jealous.

Original: Freya:They are very reliable allies.
Dialogue: They are very reliable allies.

Original: Cinque:Of course! We're Class Zero, the cream of the crop!
Dialogue: Of course! We're Class Zero, the cream of the crop!

Original: Cinque:And wherever Ace and the others go, Cinque will go too!
Dialogue: And wherever Ace and the others go, Cinque will go too!

Original: Ashe:Can we really rely on her in a fight...?
Dialogue: Can we really rely on her in a fight...?

Original: Seven:Don't worry about it. You'll see what she's capable of soon enough.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. You'll see what she's capable of soon enough.

Original: Cinque:I love this new world! Every day is better than the last!
Dialogue: I love this new world! Every day is better than the last!

Original: Eiko:You look really happy! How come you like this place so much?
Dialogue: You look really happy! How come you like this place so much?

Original: Cinque:Well, I can do whatever I want with my time now! I don't have any classes or tests here!
Dialogue: Well, I can do whatever I want with my time now! I don't have any classes or tests here!

Original: Zell:Aw, man, I know how you feel, Cinque!
Dialogue: Aw, man, I know how you feel, Cinque!

Original: Raijin:Same here, ya know!
Dialogue: Same here, ya know!

Original: Raijin:But in this world, we don't have to study! There's no homework, ya know!
Dialogue: But in this world, we don't have to study! There's no homework, ya know!

Original: Cinque:That's right! No reports to turn in, either!
Dialogue: That's right! No reports to turn in, either!

Original: Eiko:Huh? Being a student sounds awful.
Dialogue: Huh? Being a student sounds awful.

Original: Cinque:You don't go to school, Eiko?
Dialogue: You don't go to school, Eiko?

Original: Eiko:I didn't even know what a school was until coming here. I grew up with moogles.
Dialogue: I didn't even know what a school was until coming here. I grew up with moogles.

Original: Eiko:That's why I'm so jealous of everyone! You can make lots of friends at school, right?
Dialogue: That's why I'm so jealous of everyone! You can make lots of friends at school, right?

Original: Cinque:That's right!
Dialogue: That's right!

Original: Raijin:If I hadn't attended garden, I would've never met Seifer or Fujin, ya know?
Dialogue: If I hadn't attended garden, I would've never met Seifer or Fujin, ya know?

Original: Zell:You can get a lot more than knowledge at school.
Dialogue: You can get a lot more than knowledge at school.

Original: Quistis:Excuse me, boys and girls!
Dialogue: Excuse me, boys and girls!

Original: Quistis:How long do you intend to keep us waiting?
Dialogue: How long do you intend to keep us waiting?

Original: Serah:Being punctual for a group gathering is important. Try to be more considerate of other people's time.
Dialogue: Being punctual for a group gathering is important. Try to be more considerate of other people's time.

Original: Cinque:Yes, maaa'am. We're sorry.
Dialogue: Yes, maaa'am. We're sorry.

Original: Quistis:I wonder if she really means that...
Dialogue: I wonder if she really means that...

Original: Serah:Agreed. The children I can understand. I wish the older ones would be on time, though...
Dialogue: Agreed. The children I can understand. I wish the older ones would be on time, though...

Original: Zell:...Yup. That brings back memories.
Dialogue: ...Yup. That brings back memories.

Original: Raijin:Even outta school, I guess teachers can still get mad at us, ya know...
Dialogue: Even outta school, I guess teachers can still get mad at us, ya know...

Original: Eiko:I see... So this is what it feels like to be a student.
Dialogue: I see... So this is what it feels like to be a student.

Original: Eiko:I'll work hard to be the best student ever!
Dialogue: I'll work hard to be the best student ever!

Original: Cinque:Yeah! And with some practice, you can sneak out of all your classes like a pro!
Dialogue: Yeah! And with some practice, you can sneak out of all your classes like a pro!

Original: Eiko:Oooh! So you didn't mean it!
Dialogue: Oooh! So you didn't mean it!

Original: Mog:Just a little further now!
Dialogue: Just a little further now!

Original: Mog:Follow me, kupo!
Dialogue: Follow me, kupo!

Original: Cinque:You're the best, Moglin! I knew we could count on you.
Dialogue: You're the best, Moglin! I knew we could count on you.

Original: Mog:K-kupo? What's "Moglin"?
Dialogue: K-kupo? What's "Moglin"?

Original: Deuce:Hehe, Cinque is great at giving people nicknames.
Dialogue: Hehe, Cinque is great at giving people nicknames.

Original: Cinque:That's right! Moglin, Moglin!
Dialogue: That's right! Moglin, Moglin!

Original: Leon:What an odd way of addressing someone. I simply cannot understand...
Dialogue: What an odd way of addressing someone. I simply cannot understand...

Original: Locke:Have you got a nickname, too, Mog?
Dialogue: Have you got a nickname, too, Mog?

Original: Cinque:Well if it isn't Rinoski and Lockey! You two are looking good!
Dialogue: Well if it isn't Rinoski and Lockey! You two are looking good!

Original: Rinoa:Hehehe. Of course!
Dialogue: Hehehe. Of course!

Original: Locke:I was pretty surprised at first, but you get used to it.
Dialogue: I was pretty surprised at first, but you get used to it.

Original: Mog:I'll try my best, kupo...
Dialogue: I'll try my best, kupo...

Original: Cinque:Nicknames are a symbol of friendship! They close the gap between people and make you feel warm fuzzies inside!
Dialogue: Nicknames are a symbol of friendship! They close the gap between people and make you feel warm fuzzies inside!

Original: Cinque:And Cinquey's got so many new friends just waiting to be nicknamed!
Dialogue: And Cinquey's got so many new friends just waiting to be nicknamed!

Original: Cinque:Hey! Just where do you think you're going, Leonie?
Dialogue: Hey! Just where do you think you're going, Leonie?

Original: Locke:Haha! Did you think you would escape the nickname onslaught?
Dialogue: Haha! Did you think you would escape the nickname onslaught?

Original: Rinoa:Don't be so cold, Leonie!
Dialogue: Don't be so cold, Leonie!

Original: Mog:Hmm... But isn't it a little long, kupo? How about 'Lee'?
Dialogue: Hmm... But isn't it a little long, kupo? How about 'Lee'?

Original: Cinque:Nice idea, Moglin! Lee it is.
Dialogue: Nice idea, Moglin! Lee it is.

Original: Deuce:What a wonderful nickname. Lucky you, Lee!
Dialogue: What a wonderful nickname. Lucky you, Lee!

Original: Locke:Congrats, Lee. You're officially part of the club now!
Dialogue: Congrats, Lee. You're officially part of the club now!

Original: Leon:You guys...
Dialogue: You guys...

Original: Mog:You were right, Cinque. I feel even closer to everyone with these nicknames, kupo!
Dialogue: You were right, Cinque. I feel even closer to everyone with these nicknames, kupo!

Original: Rinoa:It's so much fun, too.
Dialogue: It's so much fun, too.

Original: Cinque:Right? Let's give our other friends super-duper cool nicknames, too!
Dialogue: Right? Let's give our other friends super-duper cool nicknames, too!

Original: Leon:Please leave me out of it...
Dialogue: Please leave me out of it...

Original: Sazh:Man, what a day...
Dialogue: Man, what a day...

Original: Barret:You're tellin' me...
Dialogue: You're tellin' me...

Original: Fang:What's with the long faces, guys?
Dialogue: What's with the long faces, guys?

Original: Sazh:See, we were with Cinque and the others in a flower garden earlier...
Dialogue: See, we were with Cinque and the others in a flower garden earlier...

Original: Cinque:Wooow! Look at all these pretty flowers!
Dialogue: Wooow! Look at all these pretty flowers!

Original: Selphie:Being in a field of flowers can put a smile on anyone's face!
Dialogue: Being in a field of flowers can put a smile on anyone's face!

Original: Sazh:Flowers or not, aren't you both always smiling anyway?
Dialogue: Flowers or not, aren't you both always smiling anyway?

Original: Barret:Hahaha! You said it, man!
Dialogue: Hahaha! You said it, man!

Original: Barret:What's the matter with you, Cinque? You're staring.
Dialogue: What's the matter with you, Cinque? You're staring.

Original: Cinque:Question! Why do you have a gun for an arm, Barret?
Dialogue: Question! Why do you have a gun for an arm, Barret?

Original: Barret:Huh? Where did that come from?
Dialogue: Huh? Where did that come from?

Original: Cinque:Well, I was just thinking your arm would be a whole lot cuter if it were flowers instead!
Dialogue: Well, I was just thinking your arm would be a whole lot cuter if it were flowers instead!

Original: Aerith:Hehe... So you think Barret is cute, too, I see.
Dialogue: Hehe... So you think Barret is cute, too, I see.

Original: Selphie:Well, there's no time like the present!
Dialogue: Well, there's no time like the present!

Original: Cinque:Then what are we waiting for?
Dialogue: Then what are we waiting for?

Original: Barret:S-stop that! Don't pull! It don't work that way! Fine! I'll take it off myself!
Dialogue: S-stop that! Don't pull! It don't work that way! Fine! I'll take it off myself!

Original: Fang:Haha! Sounds like a right disaster you had.
Dialogue: Haha! Sounds like a right disaster you had.

Original: Barret:What are you laughin' at!? I thought they were gonna rip my arm off!
Dialogue: What are you laughin' at!? I thought they were gonna rip my arm off!

Original: Fang:So what happened to you, Sazh?
Dialogue: So what happened to you, Sazh?

Original: Aerith:Whenever I come here, it reminds me of a very special place back home.
Dialogue: Whenever I come here, it reminds me of a very special place back home.

Original: Selphie:Where's that?
Dialogue: Where's that?

Original: Cinque:No kidding! Cinquey wants to grow flowers, too!
Dialogue: No kidding! Cinquey wants to grow flowers, too!

Original: Sazh:Haha, in this world? Are you going to carry a flowerpot around with you?
Dialogue: Haha, in this world? Are you going to carry a flowerpot around with you?

Original: Sazh:...What now?
Dialogue: ...What now?

Original: Cinque:How about we grow some flowers on Sazh's head? Then we wouldn't need a flowerpot!
Dialogue: How about we grow some flowers on Sazh's head? Then we wouldn't need a flowerpot!

Original: Aerith:I wonder if that would work.
Dialogue: I wonder if that would work.

Original: Selphie:Well, there's no time like the present!
Dialogue: Well, there's no time like the present!

Original: Cinque:Then what are we waiting for?
Dialogue: Then what are we waiting for?

Original: Sazh:L-leave me alone! Don't grow flowers on people's heads!
Dialogue: L-leave me alone! Don't grow flowers on people's heads!

Original: Sazh:We just can't catch a break...
Dialogue: We just can't catch a break...

Original: Barret:Those two are a lot stronger than they look. They're too much to handle.
Dialogue: Those two are a lot stronger than they look. They're too much to handle.

Original: Fang:Haha. She doesn't look it, but that Cinque's sharper than she looks.
Dialogue: Haha. She doesn't look it, but that Cinque's sharper than she looks.

Original: Sazh:Don't even joke about it, Fang. I've got enough to deal with as it is.
Dialogue: Don't even joke about it, Fang. I've got enough to deal with as it is.

Original: Prompto:Excuse me! Have you seen a chocobo around here?
Dialogue: Excuse me! Have you seen a chocobo around here?

Original: Bartz:A chocobo? No. Is it a friend of yours?
Dialogue: A chocobo? No. Is it a friend of yours?

Original: Prompto:Nah. I was taking it out for a ride, but I lost sight of it... I guess it went the other way.
Dialogue: Nah. I was taking it out for a ride, but I lost sight of it... I guess it went the other way.

Original: Ace:Did it really come here? It's not safe with all the monsters roaming about.
Dialogue: Did it really come here? It's not safe with all the monsters roaming about.

Original: Prompto:M-monsters!? I better find it quick!
Dialogue: M-monsters!? I better find it quick!

Original: Bartz:We'll help you look. I'm sure an extra pair of eyes or two wouldn't hurt.
Dialogue: We'll help you look. I'm sure an extra pair of eyes or two wouldn't hurt.

Original: Prompto:Are you sure? We just met...
Dialogue: Are you sure? We just met...

Original: Lightning:Did something happen?
Dialogue: Did something happen?

Original: Bartz:His chocobo ran off, so we volunteered to help him find it.
Dialogue: His chocobo ran off, so we volunteered to help him find it.

Original: Prompto:Thanks for your help! I'll be on my way once I find it.
Dialogue: Thanks for your help! I'll be on my way once I find it.

Original: Lightning:Hold on a second. Chocobo aside, it's impossible to get out of here.
Dialogue: Hold on a second. Chocobo aside, it's impossible to get out of here.

Original: Lightning:If he's here alone, that means he probably just arrived. Did you tell him he's in a different world?
Dialogue: If he's here alone, that means he probably just arrived. Did you tell him he's in a different world?

Original: Bartz:What!? You mean it might've never arrived? I never thought about that...
Dialogue: What!? You mean it might've never arrived? I never thought about that...

Original: Prompto:Um... What are you guys talking about? I don't have much experience as a hunter, so I don't quite understand all the details, but...
Dialogue: Um... What are you guys talking about? I don't have much experience as a hunter, so I don't quite understand all the details, but...

Original: Lion:Sorry about that. You might not believe it, but you're in a different world from the one you live in.
Dialogue: Sorry about that. You might not believe it, but you're in a different world from the one you live in.

Original: Lion:Youand wewere summoned by the gods of this world.
Dialogue: You—and we—were summoned by the gods of this world.

Original: Prompto:Um... Well that's, uh... Wait, what? No! You're joking, right?
Dialogue: Um... Well that's, uh... Wait, what? No! You're joking, right?

Original: Lightning:I expected as much... But this is no joke.
Dialogue: I expected as much... But this is no joke.

Original: Bartz:Yeah. We're all from different worlds.
Dialogue: Yeah. We're all from different worlds.

Original: Prompto:So you're saying I was called here from my home world...by a god? But I'm just an ordinary guy...
Dialogue: So you're saying I was called here from my home world...by a god? But I'm just an ordinary guy...

Original: Cloud:Despite what you think, you were chosen. There's no mistaking that.
Dialogue: Despite what you think, you were chosen. There's no mistaking that.

Original: Lion:One of your friends may be here already. Why don't you come with us?
Dialogue: One of your friends may be here already. Why don't you come with us?

Original: Lightning:Agreed. There's no point in staying here alone.
Dialogue: Agreed. There's no point in staying here alone.

Original: Prompto:O-okay... Lead the way.
Dialogue: O-okay... Lead the way.

Original: Cloud:Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Ace:It would've been nice if you actually came with a chocobo.
Dialogue: It would've been nice if you actually came with a chocobo.

Original: Prompto:Huh? Oh, yeah...
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, yeah...

Original: Prompto:I hope he's alright, wherever he is.
Dialogue: I hope he's alright, wherever he is.

Original: Bartz:Chocobos are tough. I'm sure he'll be just fine.
Dialogue: Chocobos are tough. I'm sure he'll be just fine.

Original: Prompto:Haha, you're right. They're cute, but definitely no pushovers!
Dialogue: Haha, you're right. They're cute, but definitely no pushovers!

Original: Prompto:Thanks, you two. What's say we chat about chocobos until we get there?
Dialogue: Thanks, you two. What's say we chat about chocobos until we get there?

Original: Prompto:NOOOCT!
Dialogue: NOOOCT!

Original: Noct:Prompto!? You're here, too!?
Dialogue: Prompto!? You're here, too!?

Original: Zidane:A friend of yours, Noct?
Dialogue: A friend of yours, Noct?

Original: Noct:Yeah. His name is Prompto.
Dialogue: Yeah. His name is Prompto.

Original: Prompto:Whoa! You look great, Noct!
Dialogue: Whoa! You look great, Noct!

Original: Prompto:And here I was shaking in my boots! I can't believe you're doing just fine.
Dialogue: And here I was shaking in my boots! I can't believe you're doing just fine.

Original: Noct:Well I haven't had any problems yet... But if you have any questions about this place, just ask.
Dialogue: Well I haven't had any problems yet... But if you have any questions about this place, just ask.

Original: Auron:I seem to recall someone who sulked at not having friends from home around... Now who was that?
Dialogue: I seem to recall someone who sulked at not having friends from home around... Now who was that?

Original: Noct:I don't know. You must be imagining things, Auron.
Dialogue: I don't know. You must be imagining things, Auron.

Original: Vincent:So you're close friends. It seems to put him at ease.
Dialogue: So you're close friends. It seems to put him at ease.

Original: Prompto:I have that effect on people! But I'm happy to see him, too.
Dialogue: I have that effect on people! But I'm happy to see him, too.

Original: Kain:If you're a friend of Noct's, you must be quite formidable in battle. Can we count on you in a fight?
Dialogue: If you're a friend of Noct's, you must be quite formidable in battle. Can we count on you in a fight?

Original: Noct:Sure can. He'll be fine.
Dialogue: Sure can. He'll be fine.

Original: Prompto:H-hold on a sec, Noct!
Dialogue: H-hold on a sec, Noct!

Original: Prompto:I mean, I heard what's going on in this world: we were summoned by some gods to fight.
Dialogue: I mean, I heard what's going on in this world we were summoned by some gods to fight.

Original: Prompto:But isn't it a little suspicious? Why are you helping them?
Dialogue: But isn't it a little suspicious? Why are you helping them?

Original: Noct:Because they're counting on me.
Dialogue: Because they're counting on me.

Original: Prompto:...That's just like you, isn't it?
Dialogue: ...That's just like you, isn't it?

Original: Prompto:In that case, I can't just run on home, can I?
Dialogue: In that case, I can't just run on home, can I?

Original: Noct:You couldn't run on home even if you wanted to, so why not lend a hand here?
Dialogue: You couldn't run on home even if you wanted to, so why not lend a hand here?

Original: Vincent:If you've got any doubts, it's best to sort those out first.
Dialogue: If you've got any doubts, it's best to sort those out first.

Original: Prompto:N-no, I'm fine! If Noct is going to help, I will too!
Dialogue: N-no, I'm fine! If Noct is going to help, I will too!

Original: Zidane:Are you sure?
Dialogue: Are you sure?

Original: Prompto:Yeah. I want to help Noct.
Dialogue: Yeah. I want to help Noct.

Original: Kain:You're a kind soul, just like Noct.
Dialogue: You're a kind soul, just like Noct.

Original: Zidane:But aren't we all the same in wanting to help a friend?
Dialogue: But aren't we all the same in wanting to help a friend?

Original: Prompto:Hehe. Well, here's to new friends in a new world!
Dialogue: Hehe. Well, here's to new friends in a new world!

Original: Jecht:Alright! This is the last one!
Dialogue: Alright! This is the last one!

Original: Prompto:Wicked cool! I gotta get this shot...!
Dialogue: Wicked cool! I gotta get this shot...!

Original: Prompto:Oh, that's right... I don't have it.
Dialogue: Oh, that's right... I don't have it.

Original: Maria:What's the matter? Did you lose something?
Dialogue: What's the matter? Did you lose something?

Original: Prompto:No... I was looking for my camera, but I guess I left it back home.
Dialogue: No... I was looking for my camera, but I guess I left it back home.

Original: Tifa:Your camera? Why now?
Dialogue: Your camera? Why now?

Original: Jecht:I am pretty cool, aren't I? I can't argue with you there.
Dialogue: I am pretty cool, aren't I? I can't argue with you there.

Original: Tifa:But in the middle of a fight? Isn't that dangerous?
Dialogue: But in the middle of a fight? Isn't that dangerous?

Original: Irvine:That's how much he loves taking photos! I have a video camera, so I know how much fun it can be.
Dialogue: That's how much he loves taking photos! I have a video camera, so I know how much fun it can be.

Original: Prompto:You're a video guy, Irvine? Sometimes you just can't control the urge to record something, right?
Dialogue: You're a video guy, Irvine? Sometimes you just can't control the urge to record something, right?

Original: Jecht:Sounds like asphere. People were crazy about thoseback home.
Dialogue: Sounds like a sphere. People were crazy about those back home.

Original: Cyan:Art thou perhaps talking about machines?
Dialogue: Art thou perhaps talking about machines?

Original: Prompto:Sorry! I guess cameras don't really exist in your world...
Dialogue: Sorry! I guess cameras don't really exist in your world...

Original: Maria:Are cameras and pictures...fun?
Dialogue: Are cameras and pictures...fun?

Original: Irvine:Cameras can make instant portraits. Some can even record movement.
Dialogue: Cameras can make instant portraits. Some can even record movement.

Original: Cyan:That sounds quite convenient. In that case, I had best prepare my finest attire...
Dialogue: That sounds quite convenient. In that case, I had best prepare my finest attire...

Original: Prompto:Oh! We're not making portraits! I just wanted to make a record of the fight...
Dialogue: Oh! We're not making portraits! I just wanted to make a record of the fight...

Original: Maria:But you can record the moment in your heart. Or is that not enough...?
Dialogue: But you can record the moment in your heart. Or is that not enough...?

Original: Cyan:Indeed. If thou can record those in thy heart, then there's no need to endanger thyself further.
Dialogue: Indeed. If thou can record those in thy heart, then there's no need to endanger thyself further.

Original: Irvine:It's difficult to explain. I guess the excitement of photography just doesn't come across in words...
Dialogue: It's difficult to explain. I guess the excitement of photography just doesn't come across in words...

Original: Prompto:But...if you have a picture, then you can show it to other people!
Dialogue: But...if you have a picture, then you can show it to other people!

Original: Maria:Why would you do that?
Dialogue: Why would you do that?

Original: Prompto:So the people who weren't there can see what you saw. That way you can share your memories.
Dialogue: So the people who weren't there can see what you saw. That way you can share your memories.

Original: Maria:That sounds wonderful! If you can make a moving portrait right away, then you can show people things that can't be described in words!
Dialogue: That sounds wonderful! If you can make a moving portrait right away, then you can show people things that can't be described in words!

Original: Prompto:Exactly! And not just things like a battle, but everyday things, too.
Dialogue: Exactly! And not just things like a battle, but everyday things, too.

Original: Cyan:Everyday things... Such as one's family?
Dialogue: Everyday things... Such as one's family?

Original: Prompto:Yeah, of course! There are loads of people who keep photos of their children!
Dialogue: Yeah, of course! There are loads of people who keep photos of their children!

Original: Cyan:I see... I would like to have one of those, too...
Dialogue: I see... I would like to have one of those, too...

Original: Prompto:Well, why don't we take pictures of each other home then?
Dialogue: Well, why don't we take pictures of each other home then?

Original: Jecht:But you don't have a camera, do you?
Dialogue: But you don't have a camera, do you?

Original: Prompto:Oh, you're right!
Dialogue: Oh, you're right!

Original: Prompto:Guess I'll just have to keep the memories of you folks in my heart!
Dialogue: Guess I'll just have to keep the memories of you folks in my heart!

Original: Prompto:No matter how many times I see that, I'm always in awe...
Dialogue: No matter how many times I see that, I'm always in awe...

Original: Terra:Hehe. Is magic rare for you, too?
Dialogue: Hehe. Is magic rare for you, too?

Original: Prompto:Yeah! It really feels like we're in a different world when I see it.
Dialogue: Yeah! It really feels like we're in a different world when I see it.

Original: Tidus:Haha! I know exactly what you mean!
Dialogue: Haha! I know exactly what you mean!

Original: Prompto:The guys and I saw so many unreal things on our journey, but I never thought we'd come to another world!
Dialogue: The guys and I saw so many unreal things on our journey, but I never thought we'd come to another world!

Original: Shantotto:The universe presents numerous unexpected events.
Dialogue: The universe presents numerous unexpected events.

Original: Shantotto:Or perhaps you're simply ignorant of powers beyond human intellect?
Dialogue: Or perhaps you're simply ignorant of powers beyond human intellect?

Original: Prompto:Yeah, but...I never thought it would happen to me. I'm just an ordinary guy!
Dialogue: Yeah, but...I never thought it would happen to me. I'm just an ordinary guy!

Original: Hope:I was, too. But my life changed in an instant.
Dialogue: I was, too. But my life changed in an instant.

Original: Prompto:Wh-what!? No way! I thought everyone here was special.
Dialogue: Wh-what!? No way! I thought everyone here was special.

Original: Hope:I was helpless. I didn't even know how to hold a weapon. I never thought I would have to fight.
Dialogue: I was helpless. I didn't even know how to hold a weapon. I never thought I would have to fight.

Original: Penelo:Same here. I went with Vaan because I was worried about him, but our journey just kept getting bigger and scarier...
Dialogue: Same here. I went with Vaan because I was worried about him, but our journey just kept getting bigger and scarier...

Original: Penelo:Even if you lead a normal life or don't know how to fight, you can get swept up in something bigger.
Dialogue: Even if you lead a normal life or don't know how to fight, you can get swept up in something bigger.

Original: Prompto:I see... So you both had your share of scary moments.
Dialogue: I see... So you both had your share of scary moments.

Original: Tidus:But everyone has their own story. So there's no such thing as being "ordinary."
Dialogue: But everyone has their own story. So there's no such thing as being "ordinary."

Original: Penelo:Right. It's like Balthier says. "I'm the leading man."
Dialogue: Right. It's like Balthier says. "I'm the leading man."

Original: Tidus:I don't know about Balthier, but you get the point!
Dialogue: I don't know about Balthier, but you get the point!

Original: Prompto:Do you think it's all right for that story to be super plain?
Dialogue: Do you think it's all right for that story to be super plain?

Original: Shantotto:By what metric do you decide what's plain? It might be something others wish to attain.
Dialogue: By what metric do you decide what's plain? It might be something others wish to attain.

Original: Hope:She's right. Only now I'm realizing how precious those ordinary days were.
Dialogue: She's right. Only now I'm realizing how precious those ordinary days were.

Original: Terra:Exactly. Every story is amazing in its own right.
Dialogue: Exactly. Every story is amazing in its own right.

Original: Terra:So even if you think you're ordinary, you're actually pretty special.
Dialogue: So even if you think you're ordinary, you're actually pretty special.

Original: Prompto:I can't really believe it just yet, but...
Dialogue: I can't really believe it just yet, but...

Original: Prompto:It really is special getting to meet all of you here.
Dialogue: It really is special getting to meet all of you here.

Original: Tidus:Oh really? You sure you're not secretly getting tired of us?
Dialogue: Oh really? You sure you're not secretly getting tired of us?

Original: Prompto:No way! I'm so glad I'm here!
Dialogue: No way! I'm so glad I'm here!

Original: Palom:Hey, Prompto! You only attacked to get the monster's attention earlier, didn't you?
Dialogue: Hey, Prompto! You only attacked to get the monster's attention earlier, didn't you?

Original: Prompto:Yeah. I thought I would let you land the finishing blow!
Dialogue: Yeah. I thought I would let you land the finishing blow!

Original: Palom:Haha, you're the best! Let's do it again next time!
Dialogue: Haha, you're the best! Let's do it again next time!

Original: Prompto:You got it, partner!
Dialogue: You got it, partner!

Original: Laguna:Haha! Prompto, are you one of his henchmen now?
Dialogue: Haha! Prompto, are you one of his henchmen now?

Original: Palom:Henchmen? Great idea!
Dialogue: Henchmen? Great idea!

Original: Prompto:For being so small, you sure have confidence and strength, Palom...
Dialogue: For being so small, you sure have confidence and strength, Palom...

Original: Wakka:You say that because he hasn't pranked you yet. That kid is nothing but a brat!
Dialogue: You say that because he hasn't pranked you yet. That kid is nothing but a brat!

Original: Palom:And I'll prank you again if you keep it up, old man!
Dialogue: And I'll prank you again if you keep it up, old man!

Original: Wakka:You're nothing but trouble. Should I call your sister?
Dialogue: You're nothing but trouble. Should I call your sister?

Original: Palom:Boo! You're no fun, Wakka...
Dialogue: Boo! You're no fun, Wakka...

Original: Prompto:Haha. Well, he does look a little mischievous, but that's made him close to everyone. I was shy when I was that age, so I'm actually kinda jealous.
Dialogue: Haha. Well, he does look a little mischievous, but that's made him close to everyone. I was shy when I was that age, so I'm actually kinda jealous.

Original: Laguna:Oh really? You seem like you could get along with anyone, though.
Dialogue: Oh really? You seem like you could get along with anyone, though.

Original: Prompto:It was just the opposite! I didn't have any friends.
Dialogue: It was just the opposite! I didn't have any friends.

Original: Vaan:How about Noct?
Dialogue: How about Noct?

Original: Prompto:Actually, I worked my butt off because I wanted to be friends with Noct.
Dialogue: Actually, I worked my butt off because I wanted to be friends with Noct.

Original: Vivi:I know how you feel, Mr. Prompto. I wanted to be friends with Zidane, so I had to be brave.
Dialogue: I know how you feel, Mr. Prompto. I wanted to be friends with Zidane, so I had to be brave.

Original: Laguna:You admired them. Having people like that around makes you want to try your best.
Dialogue: You admired them. Having people like that around makes you want to try your best.

Original: Wakka:But there are things you can't do well even if you give it your all.
Dialogue: But there are things you can't do well even if you give it your all.

Original: Vaan:Really? Maybe you're just nervous. You need to loosen up a bit.
Dialogue: Really? Maybe you're just nervous. You need to loosen up a bit.

Original: Laguna:Yeah. I tried to show off how cool I was and it got me nowhere fast...
Dialogue: Yeah. I tried to show off how cool I was and it got me nowhere fast...

Original: Palom:Seriously, Laguna? That's the worst thing you can do!
Dialogue: Seriously, Laguna? That's the worst thing you can do!

Original: Laguna:I know that...
Dialogue: I know that...

Original: Palom:But you know, someday I wanna be a sage!
Dialogue: But you know, someday I wanna be a sage!

Original: Palom:And when I become a sage, people are going to look up to me and wanna be one, too!
Dialogue: And when I become a sage, people are going to look up to me and wanna be one, too!

Original: Palom:So I have to be cool. Aren't you guys the same?
Dialogue: So I have to be cool. Aren't you guys the same?

Original: Wakka:I get it now...!
Dialogue: I get it now...!

Original: Laguna:Right... I think Seifer said he looked up to me or something like that...
Dialogue: Right... I think Seifer said he looked up to me or something like that...

Original: Palom:So you guys need to be confident and be cool!
Dialogue: So you guys need to be confident and be cool!

Original: Prompto:But I don't know if anyone will ever want to be like me...
Dialogue: But I don't know if anyone will ever want to be like me...

Original: Palom:But you already changed, didn't you? So it's only a matter of time now!
Dialogue: But you already changed, didn't you? So it's only a matter of time now!

Original: Prompto:Haha. I appreciate it, Palom!
Dialogue: Haha. I appreciate it, Palom!

Original: King:Huh? That guy looks like Alisaie...
Dialogue: Huh? That guy looks like Alisaie...

Original: Cloud:I doubt it's a coincidence.
Dialogue: I doubt it's a coincidence.

Original: ???:Excuse me. I overheard you say the name "Alisaie"...
Dialogue: Excuse me. I overheard you say the name "Alisaie"...

Original: ???:Do you know her, perhaps?
Dialogue: Do you know her, perhaps?

Original: Lenna:Yes, we do. Are you her brother?
Dialogue: Yes, we do. Are you her brother?

Original: Alphinaud:My apologies. My name is Alphinaud, and I am indeed Alisaie's brother. Is she around here?
Dialogue: My apologies. My name is Alphinaud, and I am indeed Alisaie's brother. Is she around here?

Original: King:Yeah. She's been traveling with us ever since we met.
Dialogue: Yeah. She's been traveling with us ever since we met.

Original: Lenna:Alisaie went with Y'shtola and the others to scout out the area. Shall we take you to her?
Dialogue: Alisaie went with Y'shtola and the others to scout out the area. Shall we take you to her?

Original: Alphinaud:I would appreciate it.
Dialogue: I would appreciate it.

Original: Alphinaud:...So even Y'shtola is here? What is going on?
Dialogue: ...So even Y'shtola is here? What is going on?

Original: Y'shtola:What seems to be the matter?
Dialogue: What seems to be the matter?

Original: Cloud:We found one of yours.
Dialogue: We found one of yours.

Original: Alphinaud:Alisaie! Y'shtola! Are you two alright?
Dialogue: Alisaie! Y'shtola! Are you two alright?

Original: Y'shtola:Master Alphinaud!
Dialogue: Master Alphinaud!

Original: Alphinaud:A-are you alright, Y'shtola?
Dialogue: A-are you alright, Y'shtola?

Original: King:What do you mean? She looks the same as always.
Dialogue: What do you mean? She looks the same as always.

Original: Alphinaud:B-but she just called me "master," didn't she...?
Dialogue: B-but she just called me "master," didn't she...?

Original: Alisaie:Come with me, Alphinaud.
Dialogue: Come with me, Alphinaud.

Original: Alphinaud:What is the meaning of this, Alisaie? Is this some sort of joke?
Dialogue: What is the meaning of this, Alisaie? Is this some sort of joke?

Original: Alisaie:I understand your confusion. Let me explain what's going on.
Dialogue: I understand your confusion. Let me explain what's going on.

Original: Alphinaud:Very well...
Dialogue: Very well...

Original: Alisaie:Could you give us a moment?
Dialogue: Could you give us a moment?

Original: Lenna:Of course. I'm sure you've got a lot to talk about after being reunited.
Dialogue: Of course. I'm sure you've got a lot to talk about after being reunited.

Original: Cloud:Don't mind us.
Dialogue: Don't mind us.

Original: Alisaie:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: Alisaie:You and I are the same.
Dialogue: You and I are the same.

Original: Alphinaud:The same...?
Dialogue: The same...?

Original: Alisaie:I'll tell you what I know.
Dialogue: I'll tell you what I know.

Original: Alphinaud:...I'm listening.
Dialogue: ...I'm listening.

Original: Yda:You made it, Master Alphinaud! I'm so happy you're alright!
Dialogue: You made it, Master Alphinaud! I'm so happy you're alright!

Original: Alphinaud:...I see. I heard the tale from Alisaie, but couldn't believe it. It seems to be true, though...
Dialogue: ...I see. I heard the tale from Alisaie, but couldn't believe it. It seems to be true, though...

Original: Yda:Master Alphinaud? What's wrong?
Dialogue: Master Alphinaud? What's wrong?

Original: Papalymo:Give him a moment, Yda.
Dialogue: Give him a moment, Yda.

Original: Papalymo:He's new to this world. He needs time to adjust.
Dialogue: He's new to this world. He needs time to adjust.

Original: Papalymo:Welcome, Master Alphinaud. I am glad to see you well.
Dialogue: Welcome, Master Alphinaud. I am glad to see you well.

Original: Alphinaud:I'm happy to see both you and Yda well, too.
Dialogue: I'm happy to see both you and Yda well, too.

Original: Alphinaud:It's such a relief to see everyone.
Dialogue: It's such a relief to see everyone.

Original: Tidus:...I thought you'd be happier to see your friends.
Dialogue: ...I thought you'd be happier to see your friends.

Original: Krile:Yeah. When I met up with my grandpa, I was so excited!
Dialogue: Yeah. When I met up with my grandpa, I was so excited!

Original: Alphinaud:...What!? Do I not look happy?
Dialogue: ...What!? Do I not look happy?

Original: Krile:You looked like you wanted to smile, but couldn't. I've seen lots of grown-ups do it before.
Dialogue: You looked like you wanted to smile, but couldn't. I've seen lots of grown-ups do it before.

Original: Alphinaud:Grown-ups... I see. I suppose I feel relief at seeing friends, but also uncertainty about the current situation.
Dialogue: Grown-ups... I see. I suppose I feel relief at seeing friends, but also uncertainty about the current situation.

Original: Tidus:Doesn't it make you want to scream real loud?
Dialogue: Doesn't it make you want to scream real loud?

Original: Alphinaud:I'm not very good at expressing my emotions like that.
Dialogue: I'm not very good at expressing my emotions like that.

Original: Tidus:I guess you're more the calmer type.
Dialogue: I guess you're more the calmer type.

Original: Krile:...Or should we call you "Master Alphinaud" like the others?
Dialogue: ...Or should we call you "Master Alphinaud" like the others?

Original: Alphinaud:There's no need for that.
Dialogue: There's no need for that.

Original: Alphinaud:I want to become friends with everyone, without my title. I want to stand on the forefront as equals.
Dialogue: I want to become friends with everyone, without my title. I want to stand on the forefront as equals.

Original: Alphinaud:Is that clear, Yda? Papalymo?
Dialogue: Is that clear, Yda? Papalymo?

Original: Papalymo:Understood, Alphinaud. Is that...okay?
Dialogue: Understood, Alphinaud. Is that...okay?

Original: Papalymo:Alisaie wished for the same. Isn't that right, Yda?
Dialogue: Alisaie wished for the same. Isn't that right, Yda?

Original: Yda:Yes! And Alphinaud is a precious comrade to us, too.
Dialogue: Yes! And Alphinaud is a precious comrade to us, too.

Original: Alphinaud:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: Tidus:...You two sure are alike.
Dialogue: ...You two sure are alike.

Original: Alphinaud:Alisaie and myself? Of course. We're twins. We were often mistaken for each other as children.
Dialogue: Alisaie and myself? Of course. We're twins. We were often mistaken for each other as children.

Original: Krile:Do you also fight with a sword and magic? It doesn't look like you have one, though...
Dialogue: Do you also fight with a sword and magic? It doesn't look like you have one, though...

Original: Alphinaud:We once studied under the same teacher, but...
Dialogue: We once studied under the same teacher, but...

Original: Alphinaud:Now we walk different paths, despite the circumstances of our birth.
Dialogue: Now we walk different paths, despite the circumstances of our birth.

Original: Tidus:Does that mean you don't use a sword?
Dialogue: Does that mean you don't use a sword?

Original: Alphinaud:Indeed. It's faster if I show you.
Dialogue: Indeed. It's faster if I show you.

Original: Alphinaud:Come, Obsidian Carbuncle!
Dialogue: Come, Obsidian Carbuncle!

Original: Alphinaud:This is how I fight.
Dialogue: This is how I fight.

Original: Alphinaud:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Lion:See what?
Dialogue: See what?

Original: Alphinaud:I just realized how heartening it is to have such comrades.
Dialogue: I just realized how heartening it is to have such comrades.

Original: Faris:The feeling's mutual. Going it alone out here can be tough.
Dialogue: The feeling's mutual. Going it alone out here can be tough.

Original: Lion:Right. Even if our goals are different, we can still work together.
Dialogue: Right. Even if our goals are different, we can still work together.

Original: Alphinaud:Still, it must be difficult traversing this world with so many people...
Dialogue: Still, it must be difficult traversing this world with so many people...

Original: Alphinaud:Do you have an easy way of getting around?
Dialogue: Do you have an easy way of getting around?

Original: Sazh:We've got an airship, and a huge one at that.
Dialogue: We've got an airship, and a huge one at that.

Original: Alphinaud:It's a relief knowing there are airships in this world, too.
Dialogue: It's a relief knowing there are airships in this world, too.

Original: Thancred:But there are many places you cannot go with an airship. Those we have to walk to.
Dialogue: But there are many places you cannot go with an airship. Those we have to walk to.

Original: Thancred:I'm happy to see you well, Alphinaud.
Dialogue: I'm happy to see you well, Alphinaud.

Original: Alphinaud:You as well, Thancred.
Dialogue: You as well, Thancred.

Original: Alphinaud:So you proceed by foot then. That requires quite the endurance, especially for children.
Dialogue: So you proceed by foot then. That requires quite the endurance, especially for children.

Original: Lion:Don't worry about them. The children here refuse to be outdone by the adults.
Dialogue: Don't worry about them. The children here refuse to be outdone by the adults.

Original: Faris:They've all got guts, enough to deserve a ride on my own ship.
Dialogue: They've all got guts, enough to deserve a ride on my own ship.

Original: Sazh:Do you think you have it in you, Alphinaud?
Dialogue: Do you think you have it in you, Alphinaud?

Original: Thancred:Alphinaud needn't worry about such things. He takes the rear and
Dialogue: Alphinaud needn't worry about such things. He takes the rear and—

Original: Alphinaud:Hold on. The old me may have warranted such worry, but...
Dialogue: Hold on. The old me may have warranted such worry, but...

Original: Alphinaud:I possess even more endurance than you can imagine, Thancred.
Dialogue: I possess even more endurance than you can imagine, Thancred.

Original: Alphinaud:...A lot has happened.
Dialogue: ...A lot has happened.

Original: Lion:In that case, going on foot shouldn't be a problem.
Dialogue: In that case, going on foot shouldn't be a problem.

Original: Alphinaud:That's a different issue.
Dialogue: That's a different issue.

Original: Alphinaud:Walking causes more strain than you can imagine...
Dialogue: Walking causes more strain than you can imagine...

Original: Alphinaud:I've got it. I suggest taking the occasional break to avoid exhaustion.
Dialogue: I've got it. I suggest taking the occasional break to avoid exhaustion.

Original: Sazh:Well, isn't that thoughtful of you?
Dialogue: Well, isn't that thoughtful of you?

Original: Faris:I'm with Alphinaud.
Dialogue: I'm with Alphinaud.

Original: Lion:Hehe. You're like an adviser, Alphinaud!
Dialogue: Hehe. You're like an adviser, Alphinaud!

Original: Alphinaud:...An adviser?
Dialogue: ...An adviser?

Original: Alphinaud:I do not know if my knowledge and experience are worth anything in this world, but consider me at your service.
Dialogue: I do not know if my knowledge and experience are worth anything in this world, but consider me at your service.

Original: Eiko:You're a summoner too, right? And you brought a wonderful friend!
Dialogue: You're a summoner too, right? And you brought a wonderful friend!

Original: Terra:Hmm... But I wonder why I can't hear your carbuncle's voice.
Dialogue: Hmm... But I wonder why I can't hear your carbuncle's voice.

Original: Alphinaud:So you can both borrow the power of your summons, is that correct?
Dialogue: So you can both borrow the power of your summons, is that correct?

Original: Eiko:That's right! And my friends are the best!
Dialogue: That's right! And my friends are the best!

Original: Alphinaud:That's good to hear.
Dialogue: That's good to hear.

Original: Alphinaud:But like the both of you, I am certain the summoners from other worlds have a history I am unaware of.
Dialogue: But like the both of you, I am certain the summoners from other worlds have a history I am unaware of.

Original: Alphinaud:But I am not actually a summoner.
Dialogue: But I am not actually a summoner.

Original: Rydia:Even though you summoned that carbuncle?
Dialogue: Even though you summoned that carbuncle?

Original: Alphinaud:This carbuncle is a magical entity, an artificially created being.
Dialogue: This carbuncle is a magical entity, an artificially created being.

Original: Terra:A threat? Do they attack people?
Dialogue: A threat? Do they attack people?

Original: Alphinaud:Yes... Which is why myorganizationtries to stop these "primals."
Dialogue: Yes... Which is why my organization tries to stop these "primals."

Original: Alphinaud:Carbuncle was made for that purpose.
Dialogue: Carbuncle was made for that purpose.

Original: Alphinaud:They do not summon primals themselves. They can call upon and use their "egi," or their powers.
Dialogue: They do not summon primals themselves. They can call upon and use their "egi," or their powers.

Original: Rydia:Primals... Egi... What a different world.
Dialogue: Primals... Egi... What a different world.

Original: Alphinaud:Hmm... How should I explain this...
Dialogue: Hmm... How should I explain this...

Original: Eiko:You're borrowing carbuncle's power, aren't you? Then you're the same as me!
Dialogue: You're borrowing carbuncle's power, aren't you? Then you're the same as me!

Original: Alphinaud:The fundamentals are vastly different, but when you look at it that way...I suppose we are quite similar.
Dialogue: The fundamentals are vastly different, but when you look at it that way...I suppose we are quite similar.

Original: Rydia:Then we're all borrowing the power of our friends.
Dialogue: Then we're all borrowing the power of our friends.

Original: Yuna:The world is full of all kinds of summons...
Dialogue: The world is full of all kinds of summons...

Original: Yuna:In order to summon inmy world, you need to visit anaeon'stemple first.
Dialogue: In order to summon in my world, you need to visit an aeon's temple first.

Original: Alphinaud:And what do you do there?
Dialogue: And what do you do there?

Original: Alphinaud:...There are so many things I have yet to learn.
Dialogue: ...There are so many things I have yet to learn.

Original: Alphinaud:That's it...! If you don't mind, could you tell me more about your worlds?
Dialogue: That's it...! If you don't mind, could you tell me more about your worlds?

Original: Alphinaud:If I know the fundamentals of other worlds, I may be able to further draw out Carbuncle's power.
Dialogue: If I know the fundamentals of other worlds, I may be able to further draw out Carbuncle's power.

Original: Yuna:You're quite studious, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're quite studious, aren't you?

Original: Terra:In your world, espers were a threat...
Dialogue: In your world, espers were a threat...

Original: Alphinaud:That's why I don't see the espers in your world as a threat.
Dialogue: That's why I don't see the espers in your world as a threat.

Original: Terra:But...espers weren't very common in my world.
Dialogue: But...espers weren't very common in my world.

Original: Alphinaud:Even so, I believe in your esper friends. I was able to get where I am now because I believe in my friends.
Dialogue: Even so, I believe in your esper friends. I was able to get where I am now because I believe in my friends.

Original: Terra:...Thank you.
Dialogue: ...Thank you.

Original: Alphinaud:Huff, huff...
Dialogue: Huff, huff...

Original: Sabin:You okay? It can't be easy keeping up with us...
Dialogue: You okay? It can't be easy keeping up with us...

Original: Alphinaud:I'm fine... Thank you...
Dialogue: I'm fine... Thank you...

Original: Zack:Take it easy. You can lose your footing pretty easy here.
Dialogue: Take it easy. You can lose your footing pretty easy here.

Original: Vaan:He's right. This takes some getting used to. You'll be lucky to get away with just a few scrapes if you fall down here.
Dialogue: He's right. This takes some getting used to. You'll be lucky to get away with just a few scrapes if you fall down here.

Original: Yang:You would do well not to underestimate the challenges of mountain climbing. Take your time.
Dialogue: You would do well not to underestimate the challenges of mountain climbing. Take your time.

Original: Alphinaud:I tried to keep up with the leaders because I didn't want to be a burden, but...
Dialogue: I tried to keep up with the leaders because I didn't want to be a burden, but...

Original: Alphinaud:I didn't think the others would be falling behind like this.
Dialogue: I didn't think the others would be falling behind like this.

Original: Alphinaud:You don't try to keep pace with the others?
Dialogue: You don't try to keep pace with the others?

Original: Sabin:If I get to the top quickly, I can spend more time training!
Dialogue: If I get to the top quickly, I can spend more time training!

Original: Yang:A worthy thought, Sabin.
Dialogue: A worthy thought, Sabin.

Original: Vaan:And Mog will call us if there's a battle, so everyone can go at their own pace.
Dialogue: And Mog will call us if there's a battle, so everyone can go at their own pace.

Original: Zack:I thought this group seemed like fun, so I came along. I'm interested in their training, too.
Dialogue: I thought this group seemed like fun, so I came along. I'm interested in their training, too.

Original: Sabin:Let's see then... Today we'll move as much as possible with as few breaths as we can manage!
Dialogue: Let's see then... Today we'll move as much as possible with as few breaths as we can manage!

Original: Yang:Breathing and movement are closely connected. Mastering both can increase your defenses and unlock your greatest power.
Dialogue: Breathing and movement are closely connected. Mastering both can increase your defenses and unlock your greatest power.

Original: Zack:No way! This is the real deal! I'm burning up!
Dialogue: No way! This is the real deal! I'm burning up!

Original: Alphinaud:I find it incredible you have so much energy left to spare.
Dialogue: I find it incredible you have so much energy left to spare.

Original: Alphinaud:...I will choose a slower group to climb the mountain with next time.
Dialogue: ...I will choose a slower group to climb the mountain with next time.

Original: Vaan:Out of gas?
Dialogue: Out of gas?

Original: Alphinaud:This is more stamina than I've had before. I was confident, but...
Dialogue: This is more stamina than I've had before. I was confident, but...

Original: Alphinaud:I realize I was naive to think I could keep up with you folks.
Dialogue: I realize I was naive to think I could keep up with you folks.

Original: Alphinaud:...The me of the past wouldn't even be able to admit that much.
Dialogue: ...The me of the past wouldn't even be able to admit that much.

Original: Alphinaud:Let's go to the summit together. Though I don't think I'll be able to join in your training afterward.
Dialogue: Let's go to the summit together. Though I don't think I'll be able to join in your training afterward.

Original: Zack:Don't push yourself. If you wait a little, the others will catch up.
Dialogue: Don't push yourself. If you wait a little, the others will catch up.

Original: Alphinaud:I've made up my mind, so there's no changing it. I'd like to try.
Dialogue: I've made up my mind, so there's no changing it. I'd like to try.

Original: Alphinaud:Even if they fall, they get right back up...
Dialogue: Even if they fall, they get right back up...

Original: Alphinaud:I want to be able to count myself among their ranks.
Dialogue: I want to be able to count myself among their ranks.

Original: Vaan:I don't quite get it, but I think you're doing pretty good.
Dialogue: I don't quite get it, but I think you're doing pretty good.

Original: Alphinaud:Thank you, Vaan. I hope to be like them someday.
Dialogue: Thank you, Vaan. I hope to be like them someday.

Original: Onion Knight:That looks like the last of them around here.
Dialogue: That looks like the last of them around here.

Original: Aphmau:Oh! You're not Ovjang! I'm sorry.
Dialogue: Oh! You're not Ovjang! I'm sorry.
