Dialogue: And here I thought this place looked peaceful. Hate to think about what's gonna happen in those woods.

Original: Sazh:Wish we could get those poor animals outta here somehow.
Dialogue: Wish we could get those poor animals outta here somehow.

Original: Ace:You're right, they have no idea what's coming.
Dialogue: You're right, they have no idea what's coming.

Original: Ace:I caught glimpses of the animals while we were fighting... Hopefully they were able to escape to somewhere safe.
Dialogue: I caught glimpses of the animals while we were fighting... Hopefully they were able to escape to somewhere safe.

Original: Firion:Too bad we can't call out to them. If the woods caught fire, where would they go?
Dialogue: Too bad we can't call out to them. If the woods caught fire, where would they go?

Original: Firion:I would hate for them to be left without a home.
Dialogue: I would hate for them to be left without a home.

Original: Firion:This is just like the time I ran away with Maria and Leon.
Dialogue: This is just like the time I ran away with Maria and Leon.

Original: Sazh:Yeah... If only we could send a warning their way.
Dialogue: Yeah... If only we could send a warning their way.

Original: Ace:Krile might be able to help. She can talk to animals, after all.
Dialogue: Krile might be able to help. She can talk to animals, after all.

Original: Sazh:Yeah, you're right! Let's ask her first thing when we get back.
Dialogue: Yeah, you're right! Let's ask her first thing when we get back.

Original: Firion:Good thinking. Thanks, Ace.
Dialogue: Good thinking. Thanks, Ace.

Original: Firion:(If only he were here...)
Dialogue: (If only he were here...)

Original: Firion:That screech...?
Dialogue: That screech...?

Original: Ace:It's a chocobo! We have to help!
Dialogue: It's a chocobo! We have to help!

Original: Sazh:Hey, wait up! We're coming too!
Dialogue: Hey, wait up! We're coming too!

Original: Prompto:More of 'em!?
Dialogue: More of 'em!?

Original: ???:Uwah! Go away!
Dialogue: Uwah! Go away!

Original: Rem:Is he protecting that wounded chocobo?
Dialogue: Is he protecting that wounded chocobo?

Original: Rem:You know him!?
Dialogue: You know him!?

Original: Firion:Of course I know him! Let's go!
Dialogue: Of course I know him! Let's go!

Original: Rosa:I'm right behind you!
Dialogue: I'm right behind you!

Original: Rem:There we go, all better.
Dialogue: There we go, all better.

Original: Guy:Chocobo not hurt anymore.
Dialogue: Chocobo not hurt anymore.

Original: Guy:You go home? Okay, little bird. Thank you for guiding.
Dialogue: You go home? Okay, little bird. Thank you for guiding.

Original: Rosa:Now come here. You're in even worse shape than the chocobo.
Dialogue: Now come here. You're in even worse shape than the chocobo.

Original: Guy:Little bird is safe. Only that matters.
Dialogue: Little bird is safe. Only that matters.

Original: Prompto:Hey, you gotta take it easy. You did good, now let us help you.
Dialogue: Hey, you gotta take it easy. You did good, now let us help you.

Original: Firion:He's right. If you're hurting, just tell us. We have some skilled healers with us.
Dialogue: He's right. If you're hurting, just tell us. We have some skilled healers with us.

Original: Firion:Hmm? What's wrong?
Dialogue: Hmm? What's wrong?

Original: Guy:Are others okay?
Dialogue: Are others okay?

Original: Prompto:What'd we just say!? You don't have to worry about us.
Dialogue: What'd we just say!? You don't have to worry about us.

Original: Firion:You took the worst of it, Guy. Why are you always so... You know what, never mind. I'm just glad you're safe.
Dialogue: You took the worst of it, Guy. Why are you always so... You know what, never mind. I'm just glad you're safe.

Original: Guy:Guy happy to see Firion.
Dialogue: Guy happy to see Firion.

Original: Firion:I'm happy to see you too, Guy. I can't wait to see the smiles on Maria's and Leon's faces!
Dialogue: I'm happy to see you too, Guy. I can't wait to see the smiles on Maria's and Leon's faces!

Original: Guy:So goddess not lie!
Dialogue: So goddess not lie!

Original: Rosa:Ah, so you have met Materia.
Dialogue: Ah, so you have met Materia.

Original: Firion:That means you know why we're here fighting in this strange world.
Dialogue: That means you know why we're here fighting in this strange world.

Original: Firion:This place is in danger, Guy. And we're here to save it.
Dialogue: This place is in danger, Guy. And we're here to save it.

Original: Firion:Will you help us?
Dialogue: Will you help us?

Original: Guy:Guy keep everyone safe!
Dialogue: Guy keep everyone safe!

Original: Firion:Thank you, Guy. The road ahead of us is long and
Dialogue: Thank you, Guy. The road ahead of us is long and—

Original: Guy:Do not worry. Guy protect Firion. Guy protect family.
Dialogue: Do not worry. Guy protect Firion. Guy protect family.

Original: Firion:Haha, that's what I like to hear! We are family, and I won't let us get separated again!
Dialogue: Haha, that's what I like to hear! We are family, and I won't let us get separated again!

Original: Firion:Let's bring peace back to this world, together!
Dialogue: Let's bring peace back to this world, together!

Original: Rydia:Guy was speaking with the chocobo back there, wasn't he?
Dialogue: Guy was speaking with the chocobo back there, wasn't he?

Original: Rydia:Does that mean he can communicate with them?
Dialogue: Does that mean he can communicate with them?

Original: Maria:Yes, but he can speak to all sorts of other animals as well.
Dialogue: Yes, but he can speak to all sorts of other animals as well.

Original: Krile:So he's just like me! Was he born that way?
Dialogue: So he's just like me! Was he born that way?

Original: Maria:I'm not sure. He was raised by wolves, so maybe he learned from them.
Dialogue: I'm not sure. He was raised by wolves, so maybe he learned from them.

Original: Kimahri:He calls you family, but you are not his first.
Dialogue: He calls you family, but you are not his first.

Original: Krile:He was able to learn their language just by spending time with them? Amazing.
Dialogue: He was able to learn their language just by spending time with them? Amazing.

Original: Sherlotta:(Does that mean I know someone who can talk with animals too?)
Dialogue: (Does that mean I know someone who can talk with animals too?)

Original: Sherlotta:It's like something you only hear about in stories.
Dialogue: It's like something you only hear about in stories.

Original: Rydia:Closeness breeds familiarity. Even if we can't understand each other at first, time together will fix that.
Dialogue: Closeness breeds familiarity. Even if we can't understand each other at first, time together will fix that.

Original: Guy:Words hard for Guy.
Dialogue: Words hard for Guy.

Original: Guy:But Guy like talking. Try my hardest.
Dialogue: But Guy like talking. Try my hardest.

Original: Maria:And we're happy that you do. Talking with you is always a treat.
Dialogue: And we're happy that you do. Talking with you is always a treat.

Original: Kimahri:Our wishes never betray us.
Dialogue: Our wishes never betray us.

Original: Rydia:Huh? What does that mean?
Dialogue: Huh? What does that mean?

Original: Kimahri:Only those who try will become. Guy must move forward to become what he wants.
Dialogue: Only those who try will become. Guy must move forward to become what he wants.

Original: Sherlotta:We must continue our efforts for them to bear fruit. I see...
Dialogue: We must continue our efforts for them to bear fruit. I see...

Original: Rydia:Oh, I get it. Guy can speak with us because he tried hard to learn our language.
Dialogue: Oh, I get it. Guy can speak with us because he tried hard to learn our language.

Original: Guy:Hmm... Kimahri is strange.
Dialogue: Hmm... Kimahri is strange.

Original: Guy:Kimahri is same as pack. Kimahri is same as my pack.
Dialogue: Kimahri is same as pack. Kimahri is same as my pack.

Original: Sherlotta:Hmm? Now what does that mean?
Dialogue: Hmm? Now what does that mean?

Original: Maria:Maybe Kimahri reminds Guy of his old family.
Dialogue: Maybe Kimahri reminds Guy of his old family.

Original: Krile:How so?
Dialogue: How so?

Original: Maria:Maybe Kimahri's wisdom reminds Guy of the wisdom taught by his family of wolves.
Dialogue: Maybe Kimahri's wisdom reminds Guy of the wisdom taught by his family of wolves.

Original: Maria:Plus Kimahri is the strong, silent type. Dignified, just like a wolf.
Dialogue: Plus Kimahri is the strong, silent type. Dignified, just like a wolf.

Original: Guy:Kimahri reminds me of past.
Dialogue: Kimahri reminds me of past.

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri is sorry he must disappoint Guy.
Dialogue: Kimahri is sorry he must disappoint Guy.

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri cannot speak with animals.
Dialogue: Kimahri cannot speak with animals.

Original: Rydia:Why would that disappoint Guy? No one expects you to be able to speak with wolves.
Dialogue: Why would that disappoint Guy? No one expects you to be able to speak with wolves.

Original: Sherlotta:Yeah, you don't have to please everyone, Kimahri. Stop taking everything so seriously.
Dialogue: Yeah, you don't have to please everyone, Kimahri. Stop taking everything so seriously.

Original: Krile:Besides, if you ever want to talk with an animal, you have Guy and I to help you out! Right?
Dialogue: Besides, if you ever want to talk with an animal, you have Guy and I to help you out! Right?

Original: Kimahri:Right. Kimahri will remember that.
Dialogue: Right. Kimahri will remember that.

Original: Guy:I help Kimahri. Guy know many animal words.
Dialogue: I help Kimahri. Guy know many animal words.

Original: Porom:Where's Eiko? Hmm... This way, maybe?
Dialogue: Where's Eiko? Hmm... This way, maybe?

Original: Eiko:And then, and then!
Dialogue: And then, and then!

Original: Porom:Oh, it sounds like she's having fun. Is she with someone?
Dialogue: Oh, it sounds like she's having fun. Is she with someone?

Original: Palom:And so, I think we need to step up our prank game. Who should we get next?
Dialogue: And so, I think we need to step up our prank game. Who should we get next?

Original: Gau:Guy, look! Gau found shiny! Here, Guy can have! Thank you for food.
Dialogue: Guy, look! Gau found shiny! Here, Guy can have! Thank you for food.

Original: Relm:What about me? I drew that ugly monster's picture! This is better, right?
Dialogue: What about me? I drew that ugly monster's picture! This is better, right?

Original: Porom:Hmm, it looks like everyone's gathering around Guy.
Dialogue: Hmm, it looks like everyone's gathering around Guy.

Original: Eiko:Hey, Porom! Get over here!
Dialogue: Hey, Porom! Get over here!

Original: Porom:I see you were keeping Palom company. I hope he wasn't too much trouble.
Dialogue: I see you were keeping Palom company. I hope he wasn't too much trouble.

Original: Guy:We were playing!
Dialogue: We were playing!

Original: Eiko:We're having such a fun conversation!
Dialogue: We're having such a fun conversation!

Original: Porom:Really? That doesn't seem like the Palom I know...
Dialogue: Really? That doesn't seem like the Palom I know...

Original: Palom:What's so unbelievable?
Dialogue: What's so unbelievable?

Original: Palom:Guy never gets mad. He just smiles no matter what pranks I play on him.
Dialogue: Guy never gets mad. He just smiles no matter what pranks I play on him.

Original: Palom:So I stopped trying to trick him and just decided to talk. He's a good guy.
Dialogue: So I stopped trying to trick him and just decided to talk. He's a good guy.

Original: Gau:Guy good! Guy good! When Gau hungry, Guy give him food!
Dialogue: Guy good! Guy good! When Gau hungry, Guy give him food!

Original: Porom:Is that so?
Dialogue: Is that so?

Original: Guy:Gau is small. He must eat often.
Dialogue: Gau is small. He must eat often.

Original: Guy:Guy bring enough for everyone, and Gau gave shiny in return.
Dialogue: Guy bring enough for everyone, and Gau gave shiny in return.

Original: Porom:How kind of him. That's one way to make friends.
Dialogue: How kind of him. That's one way to make friends.

Original: Eiko:Yeah, Guy's the best! He listens to me talk about whatever I want!
Dialogue: Yeah, Guy's the best! He listens to me talk about whatever I want!

Original: Eiko:Like when Zidane does something amazing. Sometimes it's good to have someone who can listen to a lady!
Dialogue: Like when Zidane does something amazing. Sometimes it's good to have someone who can listen to a lady!

Original: Guy:Guy like talking to Eiko. Guy always happy to.
Dialogue: Guy like talking to Eiko. Guy always happy to.

Original: Relm:You're happy to do anything for anyone, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're happy to do anything for anyone, aren't you?

Original: Relm:You're always like this. It'll get you into trouble some day, so it's a good thing I'm looking after you.
Dialogue: You're always like this. It'll get you into trouble some day, so it's a good thing I'm looking after you.

Original: Guy:Guy thanks you, Relm.
Dialogue: Guy thanks you, Relm.

Original: Relm:You don't have to be so nice all the time! But even if it gets you into trouble, I'll protect you, so...
Dialogue: You don't have to be so nice all the time! But even if it gets you into trouble, I'll protect you, so...

Original: Porom:I see. You're a generous soul.
Dialogue: I see. You're a generous soul.

Original: Porom:That's why everyone likes you and hangs out with you.
Dialogue: That's why everyone likes you and hangs out with you.

Original: Guy:No. Not because others like Guy.
Dialogue: No. Not because others like Guy.

Original: Guy:Because Guy likes others.
Dialogue: Because Guy likes others.

Original: Porom:Huh? How strange. You're so humble.
Dialogue: Huh? How strange. You're so humble.

Original: Porom:(This guy really is as nice as everyone says...)
Dialogue: (This guy really is as nice as everyone says...)

Original: Eiko:You should come hang out next time, Porom! We'll chat the day away!
Dialogue: You should come hang out next time, Porom! We'll chat the day away!

Original: Porom:Maybe I will. It does sound like you're having a blast.
Dialogue: Maybe I will. It does sound like you're having a blast.

Original: Porom:Well then, if you'll have me, I'd love to join you next time!
Dialogue: Well then, if you'll have me, I'd love to join you next time!

Original: Guy:Of course! Guy can't wait!
Dialogue: Of course! Guy can't wait!

Original: Prompto:They were everywhere, but I pulled through thanks to you two!
Dialogue: They were everywhere, but I pulled through thanks to you two!

Original: Celes:You don't give yourself enough credit. You more than pulled your weight back there.
Dialogue: You don't give yourself enough credit. You more than pulled your weight back there.

Original: Guy:Prompto strong. Aim impressive.
Dialogue: Prompto strong. Aim impressive.

Original: Prompto:You think so? It makes me happy to hear it!
Dialogue: You think so? It makes me happy to hear it!

Original: Prompto:Huh? Oh, you're right!
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, you're right!

Original: Celes:What's he doing in such a desolate place?
Dialogue: What's he doing in such a desolate place?

Original: Maria:Are you here by yourself?
Dialogue: Are you here by yourself?

Original: Leon:Do you think I'm plotting something?
Dialogue: Do you think I'm plotting something?

Original: Leon:I suppose it's only natural that you'd be suspicious of me.
Dialogue: I suppose it's only natural that you'd be suspicious of me.

Original: Maria:You fool!
Dialogue: You fool!

Original: Maria:Why do you think like that!? I just worry about you. You're my brother!
Dialogue: Why do you think like that!? I just worry about you. You're my brother!

Original: Maria:This place was crawling with monsters before. It's dangerous to be here alone!
Dialogue: This place was crawling with monsters before. It's dangerous to be here alone!

Original: Leon:Is that why you followed me here, even knowing the risk...!?
Dialogue: Is that why you followed me here, even knowing the risk...!?

Original: Firion:What did you expect us to do!? We're family! We're not going to just let you endanger yourself.
Dialogue: What did you expect us to do!? We're family! We're not going to just let you endanger yourself.

Original: Firion:If you have something to do here, let us help you. You won't regret it.
Dialogue: If you have something to do here, let us help you. You won't regret it.

Original: Leon:You've got it all wrong!
Dialogue: You've got it all wrong!

Original: Leon:It's exactly because you're family that I don't want you to
Dialogue: It's exactly because you're family that I don't want you to—

Original: Maria:Don't be silly! This is better than going alone, right?
Dialogue: Don't be silly! This is better than going alone, right?

Original: Firion:If you're not going to ask us to come, then we'll just have to follow close behind!
Dialogue: If you're not going to ask us to come, then we'll just have to follow close behind!

Original: Celes:Well, looks like there was nothing to worry about.
Dialogue: Well, looks like there was nothing to worry about.

Original: Prompto:That's good. It would've been awkward if they started fighting.
Dialogue: That's good. It would've been awkward if they started fighting.

Original: Prompto:Hmm? Why do you look so happy, Guy?
Dialogue: Hmm? Why do you look so happy, Guy?

Original: Guy:Leon was lonely. He fought for long time. Fought all alone.
Dialogue: Leon was lonely. He fought for long time. Fought all alone.

Original: Guy:But Leon returns home. Returns to his family.
Dialogue: But Leon returns home. Returns to his family.

Original: Guy:Guy wanted this for long time.
Dialogue: Guy wanted this for long time.

Original: Celes:...Then why don't you join them?
Dialogue: ...Then why don't you join them?

Original: Prompto:You should! You're part of his family, too!
Dialogue: You should! You're part of his family, too!

Original: Celes:That's right. And this time, nothing will keep you apart.
Dialogue: That's right. And this time, nothing will keep you apart.

Original: ???:So what do you want me to do about it?
Dialogue: So what do you want me to do about it?

Original: Spiritus:It is as I said: you are free to do as you please.
Dialogue: It is as I said you are free to do as you please.

Original: Spiritus:But you must fight.
Dialogue: But you must fight.

Original: Spiritus:That is why I called you.
Dialogue: That is why I called you.

Original: ???:Well, isn't that nice... And if I don't, I can't get back?
Dialogue: Well, isn't that nice... And if I don't, I can't get back?

Original: Spiritus:Correct. Now be on your way. All is for the sake of this world.
Dialogue: Correct. Now be on your way. All is for the sake of this world.

Original: ???:...Not like that means much to me.
Dialogue: ...Not like that means much to me.

Original: Gilgamesh:A new face? You look lost.
Dialogue: A new face? You look lost.

Original: Gilgamesh:But worry not! I, the great Gilgamesh, will take you under my
Dialogue: But worry not! I, the great Gilgamesh, will take you under my—

Original: Gilgamesh:That spear! I've never seen anything like it! Show it to me!
Dialogue: That spear! I've never seen anything like it! Show it to me!

Original: ???:A fan of weapons, are you?
Dialogue: A fan of weapons, are you?

Original: ???:It's a magitek spear, forged just for me.
Dialogue: It's a magitek spear, forged just for me.

Original: Gilgamesh:Hmm... How fascinating. I know! We must have a contest!
Dialogue: Hmm... How fascinating. I know! We must have a contest!

Original: ???:A contest?
Dialogue: A contest?

Original: Gilgamesh:Didn't Spiritus tell you that you need to fight? I'll get to see you use that spear, so we can hit two birds with one stone!
Dialogue: Didn't Spiritus tell you that you need to fight? I'll get to see you use that spear, so we can hit two birds with one stone!

Original: ???:Are you sure this is what he meant by "fight"...?
Dialogue: Are you sure this is what he meant by "fight"...?

Original: Gilgamesh:Of course! If you accept my challenge, I'll open the way for you. What do you say?
Dialogue: Of course! If you accept my challenge, I'll open the way for you. What do you say?

Original: ???:Hmm... Have it your way then!
Dialogue: Hmm... Have it your way then!

Original: ???:I guess there's no escaping the eccentric. But at least he showed me the way out of there. Now just where am I?
Dialogue: I guess there's no escaping the eccentric. But at least he showed me the way out of there. Now just where am I?

Original: ???:Hm? Seems like there's a battle going on.
Dialogue: Hm? Seems like there's a battle going on.

Original: ???:Is that...the prince?
Dialogue: Is that...the prince?

Original: ???:They even summoned that kid. Just how selfish can the gods be?
Dialogue: They even summoned that kid. Just how selfish can the gods be?

Original: ???:But...he's not too shabby.
Dialogue: But...he's not too shabby.

Original: Noct:Take that!
Dialogue: Take that!

Original: ???:He's gotten tougher since coming here.
Dialogue: He's gotten tougher since coming here.

Original: ???:Well, if I can do whatever I want as long as I fight...
Dialogue: Well, if I can do whatever I want as long as I fight...

Original: Zell:Yeah! Mission complete! Let's head back to the airship.
Dialogue: Yeah! Mission complete! Let's head back to the airship.

Original: ???:Hold it. It's my turn now.
Dialogue: Hold it. It's my turn now.

Original: Noct:Aranea!? You're here, too!?
Dialogue: Aranea!? You're here, too!?

Original: Warrior of Light:Something's not right. Be careful.
Dialogue: Something's not right. Be careful.

Original: Aranea:Good eye!
Dialogue: Good eye!

Original: Noct:What are you doing!? We're not enemies!
Dialogue: What are you doing!? We're not enemies!

Original: Aranea:Enough talk. Show me what you got, pretty boy!
Dialogue: Enough talk. Show me what you got, pretty boy!

Original: Noct:Gck! What's the matter with you, Aranea!? Don't you remember!?
Dialogue: Gck! What's the matter with you, Aranea!? Don't you remember!?

Original: Machina:Maybe she's being controlled?
Dialogue: Maybe she's being controlled?

Original: Noct:I don't want to fight you!
Dialogue: I don't want to fight you!

Original: Aranea:How sweet...
Dialogue: How sweet...

Original: Aranea:You've gotten stronger.
Dialogue: You've gotten stronger.

Original: Warrior of Light:So you no longer wish to fight...?
Dialogue: So you no longer wish to fight...?

Original: Aranea:I was told by Spiritus that I could do what I wanted as long as I fight.
Dialogue: I was told by Spiritus that I could do what I wanted as long as I fight.

Original: Aranea:I was so happy to see you, I couldn't contain my excitement. My bad.
Dialogue: I was so happy to see you, I couldn't contain my excitement. My bad.

Original: Noct:You've got to be kidding me...
Dialogue: You've got to be kidding me...

Original: Leon:It seems like she isn't being controlled, nor have her memories been tampered with.
Dialogue: It seems like she isn't being controlled, nor have her memories been tampered with.

Original: Tifa:Is she a friend of yours, Noct?
Dialogue: Is she a friend of yours, Noct?

Original: Aranea:You seem pretty close to them. You been here long?
Dialogue: You seem pretty close to them. You been here long?

Original: Noct:I guess you could say that.
Dialogue: I guess you could say that.

Original: Aranea:In that case, I think I'll stay a while. Things are bound to be more interesting with you guys around.
Dialogue: In that case, I think I'll stay a while. Things are bound to be more interesting with you guys around.

Original: Noct:I don't see why not.
Dialogue: I don't see why not.

Original: Tifa:Are you sure about this?
Dialogue: Are you sure about this?

Original: Machina:Are you really okay being summoned to an unknown world and just being told to fight?
Dialogue: Are you really okay being summoned to an unknown world and just being told to fight?

Original: Aranea:Well, there's not much I can do about it now.
Dialogue: Well, there's not much I can do about it now.

Original: Aranea:Crying about it certainly won't change anything.
Dialogue: Crying about it certainly won't change anything.

Original: Aranea:So why not embrace it?
Dialogue: So why not embrace it?

Original: Warrior of Light:You would even fight beside us as an ally?
Dialogue: You would even fight beside us as an ally?

Original: Aranea:Well, that god did say I could do whatever I want.
Dialogue: Well, that god did say I could do whatever I want.

Original: Aranea:Which means I can fight alongside His Highness if I feel like it.
Dialogue: Which means I can fight alongside His Highness if I feel like it.

Original: Leon:Ha, quite the reinforcements you've brought us, Noct.
Dialogue: Ha, quite the reinforcements you've brought us, Noct.

Original: Noct:That's what I've been trying to tell you guys.
Dialogue: That's what I've been trying to tell you guys.

Original: Aranea:Trust me, you won't regret adding this girl to your ranks.
Dialogue: Trust me, you won't regret adding this girl to your ranks.

Original: Onion Knight:So you were from the enemy nation, Aranea? I don't get that feeling when I look at you guys.
Dialogue: So you were from the enemy nation, Aranea? I don't get that feeling when I look at you guys.

Original: Aranea:Our nations were enemies, and if you're in the army, you've got no choice but to fight.
Dialogue: Our nations were enemies, and if you're in the army, you've got no choice but to fight.

Original: Prompto:But she didn't always like the empire's way of doing things, so she helped us out a lot.
Dialogue: But she didn't always like the empire's way of doing things, so she helped us out a lot.

Original: Onion Knight:I see. Even though your countries were enemies, that didn't mean you had to be.
Dialogue: I see. Even though your countries were enemies, that didn't mean you had to be.

Original: Prompto:Right. That's why we're so indebted to her.
Dialogue: Right. That's why we're so indebted to her.

Original: Aranea:I did poke my nose where it didn't belong.
Dialogue: I did poke my nose where it didn't belong.

Original: Prompto:Hehe. Well, we certainly weren't complaining.
Dialogue: Hehe. Well, we certainly weren't complaining.

Original: Prompto:But that's why I'm happy I got to learn my way around here before you!
Dialogue: But that's why I'm happy I got to learn my way around here before you!

Original: Prompto:If there's anything I can do, let me know!
Dialogue: If there's anything I can do, let me know!

Original: Aranea:You've really come a long way from that spineless kid you used to be.
Dialogue: You've really come a long way from that spineless kid you used to be.

Original: Onion Knight:Haha! You, spineless?
Dialogue: Haha! You, spineless?

Original: Prompto:Used to be! I'm stronger now! Plus, Noct is here
Dialogue: Used to be! I'm stronger now! Plus, Noct is here—

Original: Lightning:Pull back!
Dialogue: Pull back!

Original: Galuf:What are you doing here? It's dangerous! Retreat to the airship!
Dialogue: What are you doing here? It's dangerous! Retreat to the airship!

Original: Onion Knight:We'll help you fight!
Dialogue: We'll help you fight!

Original: Prompto:It's no good!
Dialogue: It's no good!

Original: Ashe:Its armor is too hard. That's why we decided to retreat...
Dialogue: Its armor is too hard. That's why we decided to retreat...

Original: Lightning:How do we beat this thing?
Dialogue: How do we beat this thing?

Original: Aranea:Get back! I'll handle this!
Dialogue: Get back! I'll handle this!

Original: Prompto:What are you going to do, Aranea?
Dialogue: What are you going to do, Aranea?

Original: Aranea:I'm going to attack and draw its attention.
Dialogue: I'm going to attack and draw its attention.

Original: Aranea:Once it stops moving, bring it down!
Dialogue: Once it stops moving, bring it down!

Original: Prompto:Got it!
Dialogue: Got it!

Original: Galuf:For a moment, I wasn't sure what would happen.
Dialogue: For a moment, I wasn't sure what would happen.

Original: Ashe:We were able to bring it down easily thanks to you, Aranea.
Dialogue: We were able to bring it down easily thanks to you, Aranea.

Original: Lightning:You're quite the strategist.
Dialogue: You're quite the strategist.

Original: Aranea:I just happened to be better equipped to fight that enemy. I'm glad no one got hurt.
Dialogue: I just happened to be better equipped to fight that enemy. I'm glad no one got hurt.

Original: Aranea:What's the matter? I thought you outgrew this.
Dialogue: What's the matter? I thought you outgrew this.

Original: Prompto:I thought I'd finally be the one helping you, but you're the one who saved us in the end...
Dialogue: I thought I'd finally be the one helping you, but you're the one who saved us in the end...

Original: Aranea:Stop sulking. This thing goes both ways.
Dialogue: Stop sulking. This thing goes both ways.

Original: Aranea:Maybe next time you'll be the one saving me from an enemy I can't fight.
Dialogue: Maybe next time you'll be the one saving me from an enemy I can't fight.

Original: Prompto:You're right!
Dialogue: You're right!

Original: Aranea:That's better.
Dialogue: That's better.

Original: Aranea:You all did well. Why don't we head back and get some rest?
Dialogue: You all did well. Why don't we head back and get some rest?

Original: Galuf:I couldn't have said it better myself.
Dialogue: I couldn't have said it better myself.

Original: Aranea:I appreciate it. Now let's get going!
Dialogue: I appreciate it. Now let's get going!

Original: ???:That presence... You're Sephiroth!
Dialogue: That presence... You're Sephiroth!

Original: ???:What are you doing here? What happens to me when you
Dialogue: What are you doing here? What happens to me when you—

Original: Sephiroth:I know you.
Dialogue: I know you.

Original: Sephiroth:Hmph. This world allows such trivial existences.
Dialogue: Hmph. This world allows such trivial existences.

Original: ???:Why do you look so smug? Answer my question!
Dialogue: Why do you look so smug? Answer my question!

Original: ???:She'll acknowledge me. Even if you're here, she'll...
Dialogue: She'll acknowledge me. Even if you're here, she'll...

Original: Sephiroth:How pitiful.
Dialogue: How pitiful.

Original: ???:You act as if we aren't bound by will. Regardless, we'll see who is worthy to walk this realm.
Dialogue: You act as if we aren't bound by will. Regardless, we'll see who is worthy to walk this realm.

Original: Zack:Hey, what're you so worried about? Everyone else can take care of themselves.
Dialogue: Hey, what're you so worried about? Everyone else can take care of themselves.

Original: Barret:Yeah, you gotta cover your own butt first. We don't have any clue what happened.
Dialogue: Yeah, you gotta cover your own butt first. We don't have any clue what happened.

Original: Cloud:Yeah, you're right. We should figure out what's going on in this world.
Dialogue: Yeah, you're right. We should figure out what's going on in this world.

Original: ???:You're mine!
Dialogue: You're mine!

Original: Barret:What the hell!? That's Sephiroth! And...who's that?
Dialogue: What the hell!? That's Sephiroth! And...who's that?

Original: Cloud:Beats me. You have any idea, Zack?
Dialogue: Beats me. You have any idea, Zack?

Original: Barret:He an enemy? A friend? I mean, he's fightin' Sephiroth...
Dialogue: He an enemy? A friend? I mean, he's fightin' Sephiroth...

Original: ???:It's you! Brother!
Dialogue: It's you! Brother!

Original: Barret:What'd he say!?
Dialogue: What'd he say!?

Original: Cloud:Brother? Me?
Dialogue: Brother? Me?

Original: ???:Help me, Brother. We can bring Sephiroth down together.
Dialogue: Help me, Brother. We can bring Sephiroth down together.

Original: ???:Don't you find it odd that he's here, this very moment? it's a sign that we must fight together.
Dialogue: Don't you find it odd that he's here, this very moment? it's a sign that we must fight together.

Original: Cloud:I'll pass. I don't have any reason to help you. Besides...
Dialogue: I'll pass. I don't have any reason to help you. Besides...

Original: Cloud:Something about you reminds me of him.
Dialogue: Something about you reminds me of him.

Original: Barret:What the hell're you talkin' about!? If he reminds you of Sephiroth, then why're they fightin'?
Dialogue: What the hell're you talkin' about!? If he reminds you of Sephiroth, then why're they fightin'?

Original: Barret:Man, you're makin' my head hurt!
Dialogue: Man, you're makin' my head hurt!

Original: ???:You would betray me again, Brother. Are you in league with him?
Dialogue: You would betray me again, Brother. Are you in league with him?

Original: Zack:While you're standing here talking...there goes Sephiroth.
Dialogue: While you're standing here talking...there goes Sephiroth.

Original: Cloud:Sorry, but I don't know anything you don't.
Dialogue: Sorry, but I don't know anything you don't.

Original: ???:You do. I just have to cut it out of you.
Dialogue: You do. I just have to cut it out of you.

Original: Zack:What!? He said he doesn't know anything. This guy doesn't look too interested in listening to reason.
Dialogue: What!? He said he doesn't know anything. This guy doesn't look too interested in listening to reason.

Original: Cloud:No, he doesn't. Why can't anything be easy?
Dialogue: No, he doesn't. Why can't anything be easy?

Original: Cloud:I'll say it one more time. I have no idea who you are.
Dialogue: I'll say it one more time. I have no idea who you are.

Original: Cloud:And Sephiroth is my enemy.
Dialogue: And Sephiroth is my enemy.

Original: ???:That much is obvious. I'll allow you that.
Dialogue: That much is obvious. I'll allow you that.

Original: Zack:Mind telling us your name? It might help us find your real family.
Dialogue: Mind telling us your name? It might help us find your real family.

Original: ???:Family? Well...
Dialogue: Family? Well...

Original: Reno:We're done with our patrol. Nothing out of the ordinary.
Dialogue: We're done with our patrol. Nothing out of the ordinary.

Original: Rude:Hold up! Reno, isn't that...?
Dialogue: Hold up! Reno, isn't that...?

Original: Reno:Kadaj! What's he doing here?
Dialogue: Kadaj! What's he doing here?

Original: Reno:It's just one piece of bad news after another with you guys.
Dialogue: It's just one piece of bad news after another with you guys.

Original: ???:Ah. You two I know.
Dialogue: Ah. You two I know.

Original: Reno:You're still after Jenova's head? Sorry, can't tell you anything useful about that.
Dialogue: You're still after Jenova's head? Sorry, can't tell you anything useful about that.

Original: Zack:Spit it out! What do you know?
Dialogue: Spit it out! What do you know?

Original: Reno:Whatever's going on, we're wrapped up in it now.
Dialogue: Whatever's going on, we're wrapped up in it now.

Original: Reno:Listen, we don't have anything to do with Jeno-...your mother. There's other things to worry about in this world.
Dialogue: Listen, we don't have anything to do with Jeno-...your mother. There's other things to worry about in this world.

Original: Rude:There's something going on behind the scenes, and we're just trying to gather any information we can. That's the truth.
Dialogue: There's something going on behind the scenes, and we're just trying to gather any information we can. That's the truth.

Original: Kadaj:I'm Kadaj.
Dialogue: I'm Kadaj.

Original: Kadaj:Bring me with you. I promise not to get in your way, Brother.
Dialogue: Bring me with you. I promise not to get in your way, Brother.

Original: Cloud:What're you planning?
Dialogue: What're you planning?

Original: Kadaj:You said it yourself. I tell you my name, and you help me look for my family.
Dialogue: You said it yourself. I tell you my name, and you help me look for my family.

Original: Kadaj:I want to find Mother. And if Sephiroth attacks again, I hope I can depend on you for help, Brother.
Dialogue: I want to find Mother. And if Sephiroth attacks again, I hope I can depend on you for help, Brother.

Original: Cloud:What do those two have to do with each other?
Dialogue: What do those two have to do with each other?

Original: Kadaj:Sephiroth is keeping Mother for himself. Even though I have every right to see her.
Dialogue: Sephiroth is keeping Mother for himself. Even though I have every right to see her.

Original: Kadaj:His existence...denies mine.
Dialogue: His existence...denies mine.

Original: Kadaj:I must find him, and I must destroy him.
Dialogue: I must find him, and I must destroy him.

Original: Cloud:If you can keep up, then fine. Anything else and you're on your own.
Dialogue: If you can keep up, then fine. Anything else and you're on your own.

Original: Kadaj:Then I'll be right behind you. Just remember that you let me follow.
Dialogue: Then I'll be right behind you. Just remember that you let me follow.

Original: Aerith:Who was that?
Dialogue: Who was that?

Original: Zack:Aerith! Are you okay?
Dialogue: Aerith! Are you okay?

Original: Aerith:I'm fine. Kadaj came in the nick of time.
Dialogue: I'm fine. Kadaj came in the nick of time.

Original: Zack:Huh. Guess I should thank you.
Dialogue: Huh. Guess I should thank you.

Original: Aerith:Yes. Thank you, Kadaj.
Dialogue: Yes. Thank you, Kadaj.

Original: Zack:Thanks, man! I knew you were a good guy after all!
Dialogue: Thanks, man! I knew you were a good guy after all!

Original: Zack:When you said you were looking for Jenova's head, I though
Dialogue: When you said you were looking for Jenova's head, I though—

Original: Kadaj:Don't talk about Mother like that!
Dialogue: Don't talk about Mother like that!

Original: Zack:I... Ah, sorry. I just Wait, your eyes...
Dialogue: I... Ah, sorry. I just— Wait, your eyes...

Original: Zack:There's no mistaking those eyes. Hey... You haven't been feeling odd lately, have you?
Dialogue: There's no mistaking those eyes. Hey... You haven't been feeling odd lately, have you?

Original: Kadaj:What? What do you care?
Dialogue: What? What do you care?

Original: Zack:Like, has your body felt strange, or anything else been...off?
Dialogue: Like, has your body felt strange, or anything else been...off?

Original: Zack:You haven't felt like you're...deteriorating or something?
Dialogue: You haven't felt like you're...deteriorating or something?

Original: Aerith:What're you talking about, Zack?
Dialogue: What're you talking about, Zack?

Original: Zack:It's just... Sephiroth started acting strange after seeing Jenova. Stranger than usual, that is.
Dialogue: It's just... Sephiroth started acting strange after seeing Jenova. Stranger than usual, that is.

Original: Zack:And it wasn't just Sephiroth. Everyone involved with Jenova just...
Dialogue: And it wasn't just Sephiroth. Everyone involved with Jenova just...

Original: Kadaj:I understand. You know what it's like to see another crumble slowly before you.
Dialogue: I understand. You know what it's like to see another crumble slowly before you.

Original: Kadaj:We must be rid of Sephiroth as soon as possible. I might share his fate in time.
Dialogue: We must be rid of Sephiroth as soon as possible. I might share his fate in time.

Original: Zack:I'm not gonna let that happen to you! SOLDIERS gotta stick together!
Dialogue: I'm not gonna let that happen to you! SOLDIERS gotta stick together!

Original: Kadaj:You don't have any reason to help me. You aren't my superior officer.
Dialogue: You don't have any reason to help me. You aren't my superior officer.

Original: Zack:That's a good idea! Alright, welcome to the squad!
Dialogue: That's a good idea! Alright, welcome to the squad!

Original: Kadaj:Huh? I fear your decline may already be starting...
Dialogue: Huh? I fear your decline may already be starting...

Original: Zack:I mean, you said Cloud was your brother, right? And I'm his superior officer, so...
Dialogue: I mean, you said Cloud was your brother, right? And I'm his superior officer, so...

Original: Zack:If you ever need to get something off your chest, you can come to me!
Dialogue: If you ever need to get something off your chest, you can come to me!

Original: Kadaj:...You idiot. If you're not going to help me, then don't follow.
Dialogue: ...You idiot. If you're not going to help me, then don't follow.

Original: Aerith:Looks like he doesn't want to be in your squad, huh?
Dialogue: Looks like he doesn't want to be in your squad, huh?

Original: Zack:He just needs a little convincing, that's all.
Dialogue: He just needs a little convincing, that's all.

Original: Aerith:He always seems to be on edge. I worry about him.
Dialogue: He always seems to be on edge. I worry about him.

Original: Zack:You act like he's a kid. He's not too much younger than us, you know.
Dialogue: You act like he's a kid. He's not too much younger than us, you know.

Original: Aerith:In any case, how do you plan on convincing him?
Dialogue: In any case, how do you plan on convincing him?

Original: Zack:You know, teach him the importance of having dreams and pride in yourself, and all that.
Dialogue: You know, teach him the importance of having dreams and pride in yourself, and all that.

Original: Zack:I'll teach him just like how I was taught.
Dialogue: I'll teach him just like how I was taught.

Original: Aerith:Well, you have my support. Good luck, squad leader.
Dialogue: Well, you have my support. Good luck, squad leader.

Original: Zack:If we stick with Cloud, then he'll show up again eventually. When he does, I plan on having a little chat with him.
Dialogue: If we stick with Cloud, then he'll show up again eventually. When he does, I plan on having a little chat with him.

Original: Kadaj:How odd. Why did I help that woman?
Dialogue: How odd. Why did I help that woman?

Original: Kadaj:Something about her seems...familiar. She...she reminds me of Mother somehow.
Dialogue: Something about her seems...familiar. She...she reminds me of Mother somehow.

Original: Gilgamesh:Uwagh! This may be too much for even a master swordsman to handle!
Dialogue: Uwagh! This may be too much for even a master swordsman to handle!

Original: Gilgamesh:Is this the end of Gilgamesh?
Dialogue: Is this the end of Gilgamesh?

Original: ???:Stand back.
Dialogue: Stand back.

Original: Gilgamesh:Such power!
Dialogue: Such power!

Original: ???:It's not down yet.
Dialogue: It's not down yet.

Original: Terra:Are you okay?
Dialogue: Are you okay?

Original: Gilgamesh:You've come just in the nick of time!
Dialogue: You've come just in the nick of time!

Original: Prompto:Wha!? Marshal Cor!?
Dialogue: Wha—!? Marshal Cor!?

Original: Cor:We'll talk later. Focus on the battle!
Dialogue: We'll talk later. Focus on the battle!

Original: Prompto:Y-Yes, sir!
Dialogue: Y-Yes, sir!

Original: Cor:We live to fight another day, it seems.
Dialogue: We live to fight another day, it seems.

Original: Prompto:Thanks, Marshal. That was a huge help.
Dialogue: Thanks, Marshal. That was a huge help.

Original: Gilgamesh:Huh!? You two know each other!?
Dialogue: Huh!? You two know each other!?

Original: Cor:You two appear younger than I remember. What's going on?
Dialogue: You two appear younger than I remember. What's going on?

Original: Cor:There's no doubt this world is different than ours.
Dialogue: There's no doubt this world is different than ours.

Original: Papalymo:He catches on quickly.
Dialogue: He catches on quickly.

Original: Aranea:You seem unsurprised to see me here.
Dialogue: You seem unsurprised to see me here.

Original: Prompto:Daemons!? Then that means...you have your memories?
Dialogue: Daemons!? Then that means...you have your memories?

Original: Gilgamesh:You two can catch up later! It's time for introductions!
Dialogue: You two can catch up later! It's time for introductions!

Original: Gilgamesh:I am Gilgamesh! The greatest swordsman who has ever lived, in this world or any other!
Dialogue: I am Gilgamesh! The greatest swordsman who has ever lived, in this world or any other!

Original: Cor:Gilgamesh, huh? That name makes me uneasy...
Dialogue: Gilgamesh, huh? That name makes me uneasy...

Original: Cor:Anyways, I'm Cor Leonis.
Dialogue: Anyways, I'm Cor Leonis.

Original: Cor:Prompto, Gladio, Ignis, and of course, Noctis, are old acquaintances of mine.
Dialogue: Prompto, Gladio, Ignis, and of course, Noctis, are old acquaintances of mine.

Original: Cor:Speaking of which, I would like to see the King. Is he okay?
Dialogue: Speaking of which, I would like to see the King. Is he okay?

Original: Prompto:Yeah, he is! I'll take you to him.
Dialogue: Yeah, he is! I'll take you to him.

Original: Cor:I'm glad to see you unharmed, Your Majesty.
Dialogue: I'm glad to see you unharmed, Your Majesty.

Original: Lulu:We found him fighting alongside Gilgamesh. Seems they're fast friends.
Dialogue: We found him fighting alongside Gilgamesh. Seems they're fast friends.

Original: Noct:You just got here and you're already fitting in. I think you'll do fine.
Dialogue: You just got here and you're already fitting in. I think you'll do fine.

Original: Cecil:Indeed. He seems like a stout ally to have.
Dialogue: Indeed. He seems like a stout ally to have.

Original: Cor:I take it you're all fighting toward the same goal?
Dialogue: I take it you're all fighting toward the same goal?

Original: Noct:Guess he already knows.
Dialogue: Guess he already knows.

Original: Ignis:It appears so.
Dialogue: It appears so.

Original: Cor:I heard it all from the woman who called herself a goddess. I didn't believe her at first.
Dialogue: I heard it all from the woman who called herself a goddess. I didn't believe her at first.

Original: Materia:Yes, you were brought here by the will of the crystal.
Dialogue: Yes, you were brought here by the will of the crystal.

Original: Materia:Noctis is already here. Join with himbe his strength.
Dialogue: Noctis is already here. Join with him—be his strength.

Original: Cor:Noctis? The king is here!?
Dialogue: Noctis? The king is here!?

Original: Cor:He wouldn't be in a place like this. Stop screwing with me!
Dialogue: He wouldn't be in a place like this. Stop screwing with me!

Original: Materia:I am only stating the will of the crystal.
Dialogue: I am only stating the will of the crystal.

Original: Cor:That was all she kept saying. I had to see you with my own eyes.
Dialogue: That was all she kept saying. I had to see you with my own eyes.

Original: Noct:Typical Cor.
Dialogue: Typical Cor.

Original: Cor:Now, I don't believe everything she was saying, but seeing you does alleviate some doubts.
Dialogue: Now, I don't believe everything she was saying, but seeing you does alleviate some doubts.

Original: Ignis:A reasonable response.
Dialogue: A reasonable response.

Original: Cor:You look as spry as ever.
Dialogue: You look as spry as ever.

Original: Cor:Moreso, in fact. You have the dignity of a king.
Dialogue: Moreso, in fact. You have the dignity of a king.

Original: Noct:Is that so? Young on the outside, old on the inside I guess.
Dialogue: Is that so? Young on the outside, old on the inside I guess.

Original: Lulu:A common occurrence in this world.
Dialogue: A common occurrence in this world.

Original: Cecil:Yeah. I suppose that's the will of the crystal as well.
Dialogue: Yeah. I suppose that's the will of the crystal as well.

Original: Noct:Hah, yeah. And I think it's the will of the crystal that you help us out, Cor.
Dialogue: Hah, yeah. And I think it's the will of the crystal that you help us out, Cor.

Original: Noct:It'll liven things up a bit, no doubt. We'll be safer, as well.
Dialogue: It'll liven things up a bit, no doubt. We'll be safer, as well.

Original: Cor:You sure you need an old soldier like me?
Dialogue: You sure you need an old soldier like me?

Original: Noct:Old? You look like you're in your prime.
Dialogue: Old? You look like you're in your prime.

Original: Cor:I guess I've been given another chance. A chance to serve a new king.
Dialogue: I guess I've been given another chance. A chance to serve a new king.

Original: Cor:I was hoping for this.
Dialogue: I was hoping for this.

Original: Cor:Even if it's in a different world.
Dialogue: Even if it's in a different world.

Original: Cor:Let me serve you, Your Majesty. Allow me to fight by your side.
Dialogue: Let me serve you, Your Majesty. Allow me to fight by your side.

Original: Noct:You got it, Cor.
Dialogue: You got it, Cor.

Original: Gilgamesh:You should have seen it! Cor Leonis, sword glinting in the sunlight, cut down his enemies with ease!
Dialogue: You should have seen it! Cor Leonis, sword glinting in the sunlight, cut down his enemies with ease!

Original: Jack:Man, what a fighter! I wish I was there!
Dialogue: Man, what a fighter! I wish I was there!

Original: Gilgamesh:He stood courageous, the wind blowing through his hair! Not a single ounce of fear in his veins!
Dialogue: He stood courageous, the wind blowing through his hair! Not a single ounce of fear in his veins!

Original: Cyan:Like a hero of legend...
Dialogue: Like a hero of legend...

Original: Gladio:Looks like you guys are having fun. What're you talking about?
Dialogue: Looks like you guys are having fun. What're you talking about?

Original: Sherlotta:Oh! The man himself!
Dialogue: Oh! The man himself!

Original: Jack:Gilgamesh was just regaling us with the tale of your heroics, yo!
Dialogue: Gilgamesh was just regaling us with the tale of your heroics, yo!

Original: Gilgamesh:I still dream of it! No enemy is too fierce to face with Cor Leonis by our side!
Dialogue: I still dream of it! No enemy is too fierce to face with Cor Leonis by our side!

Original: Gladio:Of course. That's why they call him The Immortal.
Dialogue: Of course. That's why they call him The Immortal.

Original: Jack:Whaaat!? The Immortal? Really?
Dialogue: Whaaat!? The Immortal? Really?

Original: Cor:Hey, Gladio, maybe you should...
Dialogue: Hey, Gladio, maybe you should...

Original: Gladio:You don't want 'em to know?
Dialogue: You don't want 'em to know?

Original: Gilgamesh:Gilgamesh!? Another master of blades!?
Dialogue: Gilgamesh!? Another master of blades!?

Original: Gilgamesh:Ah, I see! That explains the strange expression on your face when I introduced myself!
Dialogue: Ah, I see! That explains the strange expression on your face when I introduced myself!

Original: Cyan:The shield of the king? Then that means Gladiolus was tested as well, does it not?
Dialogue: The shield of the king? Then that means Gladiolus was tested as well, does it not?

Original: Cor:You were tested, and you succeeded. He's a fiercer warrior than I ever was.
Dialogue: You were tested, and you succeeded. He's a fiercer warrior than I ever was.

Original: Gladio:Heh, thanks, Marshal...
Dialogue: Heh, thanks, Marshal...

Original: Sherlotta:It is heartening to see those younger than us improve.
Dialogue: It is heartening to see those younger than us improve.

Original: Cor:The old must give way to the new. None can stop the march of time, and I have nothing left to teach.
Dialogue: The old must give way to the new. None can stop the march of time, and I have nothing left to teach.

Original: Jack:Pshhh, yeah right! I want to learn that awesome technique you used!
Dialogue: Pshhh, yeah right! I want to learn that awesome technique you used!

Original: Gladio:Yeah, your work isn't done yet, Marshal.
Dialogue: Yeah, your work isn't done yet, Marshal.

Original: Gladio:Let's both strive to be better than we were the day before.
Dialogue: Let's both strive to be better than we were the day before.

Original: Cyan:It truly is encouraging to see such eagerness in the young. Isn't that right, Cor Leonis?
Dialogue: It truly is encouraging to see such eagerness in the young. Isn't that right, Cor Leonis?

Original: Cor:Hah, I suppose...
Dialogue: Hah, I suppose...

Original: Cor:Between you and Noctis, I'll never have a chance to rest.
Dialogue: Between you and Noctis, I'll never have a chance to rest.

Original: Cor:Well then, if you insist, I'll train you. But don't complain when the going gets tough.
Dialogue: Well then, if you insist, I'll train you. But don't complain when the going gets tough.

Original: Guy:Machina okay?
Dialogue: Machina okay?

Original: Machina:No... No, it's nothing, Guy.
Dialogue: No... No, it's nothing, Guy.

Original: Guy:Machina often looks like that.
Dialogue: Machina often looks like that.

Original: Machina:I was just thinking...
Dialogue: I was just thinking...

Original: Machina:Thinking about the friends of mine who've yet to come here.
Dialogue: Thinking about the friends of mine who've yet to come here.

Original: Machina:Same here, even though they may not think of me as a friend.
Dialogue: Same here, even though they may not think of me as a friend.

Original: Cinque:No way, Machy! They love you just as much as we do!
Dialogue: No way, Machy! They love you just as much as we do!

Original: Kain:Any guesses we make here are simply that: guesses. We won't know until you meet them.
Dialogue: Any guesses we make here are simply that guesses. We won't know until you meet them.

Original: Machina:I know that, but still...
Dialogue: I know that, but still...

Original: Kain:I see. A guilty conscience is a hard thing to dispel.
Dialogue: I see. A guilty conscience is a hard thing to dispel.

Original: Galuf:Spoken from one who knows much of the matter.
Dialogue: Spoken from one who knows much of the matter.

Original: Galuf:There is one thing to remember, however. Regret can sometimes compel us to greater action.
Dialogue: There is one thing to remember, however. Regret can sometimes compel us to greater action.

Original: Galuf:In this world we might have the chance to make up for our regrets.
Dialogue: In this world we might have the chance to make up for our regrets.

Original: Kain:You seem to speak from experience.
Dialogue: You seem to speak from experience.

Original: Galuf:Hahaha! No, no, no. That was just something Jecht said.
Dialogue: Hahaha! No, no, no. That was just something Jecht said.

Original: Cinque:Hey! Don't keep the laughs to yourself!
Dialogue: Hey! Don't keep the laughs to yourself!

Original: Guy:Guy want to know about your friends.
Dialogue: Guy want to know about your friends.

Original: Ace:Of course. There was Queen for one.
Dialogue: Of course. There was Queen for one.

Original: Ace:She was the smartest student in Class Zero. She would beat Trey and me on every test.
Dialogue: She was the smartest student in Class Zero. She would beat Trey and me on every test.

Original: Cinque:And we can't forget Sice!
Dialogue: And we can't forget Sice!

Original: Cinque:Hey...sort of like you, Kain!
Dialogue: Hey...sort of like you, Kain!

Original: Ace:But during an actual mission, they...
Dialogue: But during an actual mission, they...

Original: ???:This isn'tOrience.
Dialogue: This isn't Orience.

Original: ???:I suppose what that woman said was true.
Dialogue: I suppose what that woman said was true.

Original: ???:I need to find the others. Quickly.
Dialogue: I need to find the others. Quickly.

Original: Seifer:Don't make me say it again! Clean up that uniform!
Dialogue: Don't make me say it again! Clean up that uniform!

Original: Nine:Oh yeah!? What're you gonna do about it, yo!?
Dialogue: Oh yeah!? What're you gonna do about it, yo!?

Original: Selphie:They're still going at it.
Dialogue: They're still going at it.

Original: Tidus:This is definitely a sight.
Dialogue: This is definitely a sight.

Original: Cater:Yeah, never gets boring.
Dialogue: Yeah, never gets boring.

Original: Seifer:If you won't listen to reason, I'll have to beat it into you!
Dialogue: If you won't listen to reason, I'll have to beat it into you!

Original: Nine:Now you're talkin' my language, yo! Let's go!
Dialogue: Now you're talkin' my language, yo! Let's go!

Original: Tidus:Now they've gone and done it. We need to stop this.
Dialogue: Now they've gone and done it. We need to stop this.

Original: Selphie:You're right. This doesn't look good.
Dialogue: You're right. This doesn't look good.

Original: ???:Stop it, you two!
Dialogue: Stop it, you two!

Original: Nine:Huh? That voice...
Dialogue: Huh? That voice...

Original: Nine:What the-!? Is that you, Queen!?
Dialogue: What the-!? Is that you, Queen!?

Original: Queen:I see you have no difficulty causing trouble in whatever world you're in.
Dialogue: I see you have no difficulty causing trouble in whatever world you're in.

Original: Nine:Hey, hold on! He started it!
Dialogue: Hey, hold on! He started it!

Original: Seifer:What's this? A new face?
Dialogue: What's this? A new face?

Original: Seifer:Whatever. It's not worth it.
Dialogue: Whatever. It's not worth it.

Original: Cater:Introductions are in order. This is Queen, our classmate.
Dialogue: Introductions are in order. This is Queen, our classmate.

Original: Selphie:I've heard all about you from Ace! You always beat them at tests, didn't you?
Dialogue: I've heard all about you from Ace! You always beat them at tests, didn't you?

Original: Queen:Yes. They never did score higher than me.
Dialogue: Yes. They never did score higher than me.

Original: Tidus:You were the class leader, right? Jack told me.
Dialogue: You were the class leader, right? Jack told me.

Original: Queen:No! I was never the leader of anything. Jack is always exaggerating.
Dialogue: No! I was never the leader of anything. Jack is always exaggerating.

Original: Kurasame:Now this brings me back.
Dialogue: Now this brings me back.

Original: Cater:Oh, Commander Kurasame!
Dialogue: Oh, Commander Kurasame!

Original: Queen:...Kurasame Susaya.
Dialogue: ...Kurasame Susaya.

Original: Kurasame:Another member of the class joins this world.
Dialogue: Another member of the class joins this world.

Original: Queen:Oh, I understand. You were our leader.
Dialogue: Oh, I understand. You were our leader.

Original: Queen:However, I can't remember you. But I remember seeing your name in the graveyard...
Dialogue: However, I can't remember you. But I remember seeing your name in the graveyard...

Original: Kurasame:Just so. That was the will of Orience's crystal.
Dialogue: Just so. That was the will of Orience's crystal.

Original: Queen:Yes. It was written that you were the commanding officer for Class Zero.
Dialogue: Yes. It was written that you were the commanding officer for Class Zero.

Original: Kurasame:That's fine.
Dialogue: That's fine.

Original: Kurasame:You know just as much as you should. To you, I am nothing more than your commanding officer.
Dialogue: You know just as much as you should. To you, I am nothing more than your commanding officer.

Original: Tidus:If you don't have any memories of him, then you can start making them in this world!
Dialogue: If you don't have any memories of him, then you can start making them in this world!

Original: Selphie:That's right. At first, he was always butting heads with Ace and the others.
Dialogue: That's right. At first, he was always butting heads with Ace and the others.

Original: Selphie:But now they all look up to him. They hang on his every word!
Dialogue: But now they all look up to him. They hang on his every word!

Original: Queen:So they're here too?
Dialogue: So they're here too?

Original: Queen:I suppose the reason I feel this desire to take classes with you lies somewhere within my memories. Or perhaps...
Dialogue: I suppose the reason I feel this desire to take classes with you lies somewhere within my memories. Or perhaps...

Original: Selphie:Don't think about it too hard! Everyone's here, so it'll be a blast! I'm gonna join you guys too. Isn't that right, Mr. Kurasame?
Dialogue: Don't think about it too hard! Everyone's here, so it'll be a blast! I'm gonna join you guys too. Isn't that right, Mr. Kurasame?

Original: Kurasame:If you insist.
Dialogue: If you insist.

Original: Kurasame:It'll be quite the lesson, indeed.
Dialogue: It'll be quite the lesson, indeed.

Original: Guy:Guy have question for Queen.
Dialogue: Guy have question for Queen.

Original: Queen:Okay. What is it?
Dialogue: Okay. What is it?

Original: Guy:Machina reunited with Queen, but Machina still sad.
Dialogue: Machina reunited with Queen, but Machina still sad.

Original: Guy:Guy worry. Machina is kind soul.
Dialogue: Guy worry. Machina is kind soul.

Original: Guy:Guy want to help.
Dialogue: Guy want to help.

Original: Queen:Machina is...sad?
Dialogue: Machina is...sad?

Original: Maria:Guy's been very worried about Machina lately.
Dialogue: Guy's been very worried about Machina lately.

Original: Maria:It seems that Machina has been spending even more time brooding since you showed up, Queen.
Dialogue: It seems that Machina has been spending even more time brooding since you showed up, Queen.

Original: Firion:We've heard about what happened in your world.
Dialogue: We've heard about what happened in your world.

Original: Firion:I thought this reunion would be a happy one, but...
Dialogue: I thought this reunion would be a happy one, but...

Original: Queen:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Queen:Thank you, everyone.
Dialogue: Thank you, everyone.

Original: Queen:Thank you for worrying about us. It means a lot.
Dialogue: Thank you for worrying about us. It means a lot.

Original: Queen:I should probably... I mean, I really should speak with him.
Dialogue: I should probably... I mean, I really should speak with him.

Original: Queen:I'll do it as soon as I can.
Dialogue: I'll do it as soon as I can.

Original: Machina:...I'm so sorry!
Dialogue: ...I'm so sorry!

Original: Machina:I've been wanting to apologize...
Dialogue: I've been wanting to apologize...

Original: Machina:I've talked with the others in Class Zero, but I haven't had a chance to speak with you yet, Queen.
Dialogue: I've talked with the others in Class Zero, but I haven't had a chance to speak with you yet, Queen.

Original: Machina:I was scared and selfish. I hid my emotions like a child.
Dialogue: I was scared and selfish. I hid my emotions like a child.

Original: Machina:So I...
Dialogue: So I...

Original: Queen:Machina, Rem, I want you to listen to me.
Dialogue: Machina, Rem, I want you to listen to me.

Original: Queen:It is I who should be apologizing.
Dialogue: It is I who should be apologizing.

Original: Rem:Huh? Why?
Dialogue: Huh? Why?

Original: Queen:Do you remember?
Dialogue: Do you remember?

Original: Queen:Machina and I were at each other's throats.
Dialogue: Machina and I were at each other's throats.

Original: Queen:I don't believe what I said was wrong.
Dialogue: I don't believe what I said was wrong.

Original: Queen:I should have spoken with Machina with more composure. I should have tried to understand his perspective.
Dialogue: I should have spoken with Machina with more composure. I should have tried to understand his perspective.

Original: Queen:Here I've been able to speak with people from many different worlds. I gained an objective understanding of Class Zero's emotions.
Dialogue: Here I've been able to speak with people from many different worlds. I gained an objective understanding of Class Zero's emotions.

Original: Queen:That includes you, Machina. Only by getting closer to you was I able to see things I couldn't before.
Dialogue: That includes you, Machina. Only by getting closer to you was I able to see things I couldn't before.

Original: Queen:So, I'm sorry.
Dialogue: So, I'm sorry.

Original: Queen:And thank you. You were at our side during the final fight, right?
Dialogue: And thank you. You were at our side during the final fight, right?

Original: Queen:It has been thanks to you that we were able to accomplish everything we have.
Dialogue: It has been thanks to you that we were able to accomplish everything we have.

Original: Machina:But I... I...
Dialogue: But I... I...

Original: Queen:I've talked to Guy and the others. They worry about you.
Dialogue: I've talked to Guy and the others. They worry about you.

Original: Machina:They can't keep to themselves, huh...
Dialogue: They can't keep to themselves, huh...

Original: Queen:They're good friends.
Dialogue: They're good friends.

Original: Queen:So here I promise. For Machina, Rem, and all the other people I've met in this world.
Dialogue: So here I promise. For Machina, Rem, and all the other people I've met in this world.

Original: Queen:I promise to give you all I have.
Dialogue: I promise to give you all I have.

Original: Machina:Thanks, Queen.
Dialogue: Thanks, Queen.
